Program mi coko madit mi oro 2017
Lub video mi coko madit maeni kubang’ nindo, kara inwang’ kony mi ciro amulaic man imediri nitimo tic maber.
Icopo foyo nidikiri i coko masegi ma bitimere i saa mi program. Bende kan imito ing’ei lembe mange dupa iwi batizo, giramia, jol, ju m’umiiri ku berocwinygi, kabedo, piny m’urwinyo man ma junwang’u, yath mir ular ng’adi mond kae.
PONJ LEMBE LEE AKECA
JUKANI M’UBETIMO YENY PA YEHOVA TIN?
kubang’ oro, wabed wacokra karacelo wang’ adek pi coko mwa ma dongo dongo. Icopo nwang’u kony nenedi i coko maeno ma dongo dongo?

BE ING’EYO ni gima oger kani en ang’o? En hema makende ma ilame Jehova. Iluonge bende ni tabanakel. Ji ne otieko gere higa achiel, bang’ wuok Misri. Be ing’eyo ni ng’ama ne dwaro ni mondo ogere?
Jehova ema ne owacho mondo ogere. Musa kane podi ni ewi Got Sinai, Jehova ne onyise kaka onego ger tabanakelno. Ne owacho ni mondo ogere e yo ma nyalo miyo ogonye mayot. Mano ne nyalo miyo oting’re e yo mayot kitere komachielo, kendo kigere bende. Kuom mano, kinde duto ma Jo-Israel ne dar kowuok kamoro k
... (589 chars skipped) ... 

Koro ng’i ane ot maduong’ ei hema. Oduong’ nyadiriyo maloyo ot kama oketie sandug singruok. Be ineno iro kawuok e wi sandug singruokno? Ma e altar kama jodolo wang’oe gik moko mang’we ng’ar miluongo ni ubani. Kendo nitie siro mar taya ma nigi teche abiriyo. Bende, nitie koda mesa kanyo. E mesano ne ikete makate 12.
Oko mar tabanakel, nitie bakul kata besen maduong’ ma opong’ gi pi. Jodolo tiyo kode e lwokruok. Bende nitie kendo maduong’ mar misango. Kanyo e kama iwang’e le moseyang’, kaka chiwo
... (589 chars skipped) ...
Som Wuok 25:8-40; 26:1-37; 27:1-8; kod 28:1.
Jokerubi ma ne ni e ‘sandug singruok’ ne gin ranyisi mar ang’o? (Wuok 25:20, 22; Kwan 7:89; 2 Ruo. 19:15)
- Som Wuok 30:1-10, 17-21; 34:1, 2; kod Jo Hibrania 9:1-5.
Ang’o momiyo Jehova ne jiwo wach ler mar del ne jodolo matiyo e tabernakel, to mano miyowa puonj mane? (Wuok 30:18-21; 40:30, 31; Hibr. 10:22)
Jaote Paulo nyiso nade ni tabernakel koda Chike Musa ne koro ok ti e kinde ma ne ondiko barua mare ni Jokristo ma Jo-Hibrania? (Hibr. 9:1, 9; 10:1)

MAYIENGA FM: Siasa ka onge gop ng’ato en-ga mana personal interest ~ Kevin Osido.
Kaponono jatelo moro ne osiro gi wadgi e laro kom ker kata kombe mamoko mag siasa ekinde mokalo mano ok nyisni ng’ano gini gope mosiko” Kevin Osido.
“Kuom dweche buora mabiro, abiro luorora gi Senator Gideon Moi, e kauntiz duto makaluo, kendo akwayo ogandawa mondo orwake gi chuny achiel nimar kata mana buch siasa mar KANU makoro wan jokanyo mage-gi, ne ochak mana gi Jaramogi Oginga Odinga gi mosenindo Tom Mboya” Tom Ojanga.
ALFRED OULA.

Jeremia 30
Rwot ocikke me dwoko jo ma yam giterogi i opii cen i Jerucalem
1Man lok ma Rwot oloko ki Jeremia. 2Rwot ma en Lubaŋa pa Icrael owaco ni, “Co lok ducu ma abedo ka loko boti-ni i buk, 3pien kare tye ka bino ma abidwoko iye gum bot jona jo Icrael ki jo Juda. Abikwanyogi adwokogi cen i lobo ma yam amiyo bot kwarogi, gibileyo doŋ bedo megi. Man Rwot ma owaco.”
4Magi gin aye lok ma Rwot oloko ma okemo Icrael ki Juda:
5Rwot owaco kuman ni,
“Wawinyo koko ma baŋo dano,
koko ma kelo lworo, ento
... (1015 chars skipped) ... 
yogi iye;
ento wun pe abityekowu woko liweŋ.
Abipwodowu maberber pe ki kiniga twatwal,
ento pe abiwekowu ma pe aketo can i komwu.
Man Rwot ma owaco.”
12Rwot owaco bot jone ni,
“Waŋ retwu pe doŋ caŋ,
waŋ burre odet marac.
13Ŋat mo pe ma twero cuŋ piwu,
yat bene pe me aketa i waŋ burwu,
waŋ burwu pe doŋ can.
14Jo ma gimarowu-ni ducu wigi doŋ owil woko i komwu;
gin pe doŋ giparo piwu wacel.
Pien alwenyo i komwu macalo lukworra;
dok bene aketo can magwa i komwu laboŋo kica,
pien balwu dwoŋ,
ki gin m
... (1015 chars skipped) ...
unogi.
21Ŋat ma bibedo laker ma loyogi bene bia ki i kingi,
ŋat ma bibedo laloc gi bibedo dano me rokgi kikome.
Ka alwoŋe, ci en binyiko cok bota;
pien ŋat mo pe twero ette me bino cok bota ka pe alwoŋe.
22Wun wubibedo jona,
ki an abibedo Lubaŋawu.”
23Koŋ inen yamo kot pa Rwot! Akemone bedo calo yamo lapiru mager, ma bimwoc woko lituc i wi jo maraco. 24Akemone pe bigik nio waŋ ma en ocobo tiyo gin ma onoŋo doŋ otamo me timone. I kare ma lacen, i nino ma pud tye anyim, jone gibiniaŋ maber makato.

# 255 Ka Tichwa Oserumo
1. Ka tichwa oserumo, ka wasetieko ng`wewa;Mi nyithindi, yueyoni,nyaka chieng`, Wuonwa.
2. Kwasetieko lwenjewa,koseneg jasikwa;Eka wanayud kuomi,kuwe ma nyaka chieng`.
3. Ka mudho me piny norum,ka ndalo Ruodhwa noru;Mondo wane chieng` mari,Ler ma nyaka chieng`.
4. Chieng` ma chunywa noyud mor,nikech kuyo orumo;Ywe pi wang`wa, miwa mor,Mor ma nyaka chieng`.
5. Ka ji timonwa malit,Mi watim machal Yesu;Puonjwa herani maler,Hera mochwere.
6. Kaw ngimawa orumo,kendo liel oruakowa;Ruodh ngima mond` imiwa,ngima mochwere.

Mondo omi watim duto ma wanyalo e chopo “wach maber” ne ji e “piny, ne ogendni duto, gi dhoudi duto, gi dhok duto, kod ji mopogore opogore duto,” wagoyo bugewa e dhok mokalo 750. (Fweny 14:6) Ang’o ma konyowa chopo migawo mapekni? Ikonyowa gi jondiko ma wuok e piny ma ngima kod jolok-dhok mochiwore ma duto gin Joneno mag Jehova.
Ikwongo ndik weche e dho Ingresa. Bura Matayo tayo tije mag Migawo Mochung’ne Ndiko e ofis maduong’ mar piny mangima. Migawoni tayo tije mag jondiko matiyo e ofis maduon
... (133 chars skipped) ... 
pogore, to mano miyo ji mawuok e pinje mang’eny orwak weche manie bugewa.
Wechego ikowo ne jolok-dhok. Bang’ pwodho wechego, iorogi e yor kompyuta ne grube mag jolok-dhok kuonde duto e piny mangima mondo gilok weche e dhok madwarore kendo ginon ni giloko kare. Gitemo yiero “weche mag adiera” mondo tiend weche owinjre kaka giwinjore e dho Ingresa.—Eklesiastes 12:10.
Kompyuta miyo tich dhi mapiyo piyo. Kompyuta ok nyal kawo kar jondiko koda jolok-dhok. Kata kamano, program mag kompyuta koda dikson
... (133 chars skipped) ...
 ni Multilanguage Electronic Publishing System (MEPS) mitiyogo e ndiko weche e dhok miche, keto piche maluwore gi wechego, kendo chanogi kaka dwarore mondo gibed moikore ne gocho.
Ang’o momiyo watimo kinda ma kamano mondo walok weche e dhok kata mana ma iwacho gi ji manok? Watimo kamano nikech dwaro mar Jehova en ni “ji mopogore opogore duto onego ores kendo gibed gi ng’eyo malong’o chuth e wi adiera.”—1 Timotheo 2:3, 4.
Indiko bugewa e yo mane?
Ang’o momiyo waloko bugewa e dhok mang’eny kamano?

Kampala | Inge nino acel keken ma latela ne me pati NUP Robert Kyagulanyi Ssentamu owaco ni eryemo alube kore (Deputy Preciden) ma lo Central Uganda Mathias Mpuuga, en Mpuuga, odwoko lok makec, ileb Acholi.
Ibalo ma en ocoyo iceng Abic Maleng (Holy/Good Friday) bot pati ne, “Onenocan” Mpuuga, ibalo ne, nen calo oye ni Ojudaya tii kalweny ikume.
Ngo ma en ocoyo en kore ki kore!
Ladit ma loyo dul me
National Unity Platform (NUP),
Kampala.
LOK NI KI RYEMO AN MA CALO LA LUB KOR LADIT MA LOYO DUL ME 
... (125 chars skipped) ... 
i in aye icoyo, kit ma dul me National Unity Platform dong tye ka tic Kwede ikare ni.
Ka ce lok ada ni waraga man in aye icoyo dok bene in aye iketo cingi iye, awuru awura dok apari ki kica ki kit ma i tye ka time kede ikare man ma ping tek.
Aniang dok bene angeyo ni ki tye ka keto lyeto I Komi ma Oweko Itye ka time kuman. Pe angeyo kit ma myere akonyi kwede onyo kit ma myere ajol Kori kwede.
Ma lube ki lok kom waraga ma ni in icoyo ni, ni Ngat ma ki ryemo ni pe omiyo lagam ma pore pi adot ma ik
... (125 chars skipped) ...
nity Platform ki bot joo ma omako wun.
Ping ma odiyo wa ma rac ka cel ki jami ma tye ka time obimina kare ki cawa me penyo tam pa ludito ma loyo dul me national unity platform wek wa nen kit me ceto anyim.
Alegi doki ni iye wek apari kica tutwale pi mak ma ki mako kede ki dul tela ma lamal ma loyo i National Unity Platform ma oweko pe itwero tam ma ber.
Adong ma calo Latic ma Megi ka cel ki National Unity Platform ka cel ki Dano ducu my I lobo man.
Mathias Mpuuga (MP)
COMMISSIONER OF PARLIAMENT.

RAHAB ne ochung’ e dirisa kong’iyo pewni ma ne olworo Jeriko. Ne en okinyi mang’ich kendo piny ne pod tip tip. Jolweny mag Jo-Israel ne ochokore e pewnigo. Kane Jo-Israel ochako lworo Jeriko kendo, buru ne dum malich ka tunge buora bende goyo koko.
Thurgi Rahab ne en Jeriko; omiyo ne ong’eyo kuno maber. Nong’eyo nderni kod ute ma ne ni kuno. Nong’eyo bende chirni kod duke. To moloyo, nong’eyo maber joma ne odak kuno. Ne oneno kaka jothurgigo ne medo bedo maluor sama Jo-Israel ne lworo dalano pil
... (5053 chars skipped) ... 
e Jo-Israel dhi monjo kendo nyalo bedo ni ne enie dala ma ne loyo tekie mogik. Joshua ne dwaro ng’eyo gima ne gidhi romogo e dalano. Nenore ni jootego ne oyiero dhi e od Rahab ka ging’eyo. Ne ging’eyo ni buoro e od dhako ma jachode ema ne nyalo miyo kik fwenygi mayot. Nyalo bedo ni jootegi bende ne geno yudo weche manyalo konyogi e mbaka ma ne ji goyo kuno.
Muma wacho ni Rahab “norwako joote.” (Jakobo 2:25) Kata obedo ni ne ochich kodgi, pod norwakogi e ode, moyienegi buoro kuno. Samoro ne ogeno
... (5053 chars skipped) ...
a Rahab, ma en ot ma ne ji onyisoe yie makende e kama nonyuolie Ruoth Daudi kae to bang’e, ochak onyuolie Mesia wuon, ma en Yesu Kristo.—Joshua 6:22-25; Mathayo 1:5, 6, 16.
Sigand Rahab nyisowa ni e wang’ Nyasaye, onge ng’at manono. Onenowa waduto, osomo chunywa, kendo omor koneno yie ma wan-go kata ka en yie matin manade kaka ma ne Rahab nigo. Yie ma ne Rahab nigo ne omiyo okawo okang’. Mana kaka Muma wacho, Rahab “ne oket kare kuom tim.” (Jakobo 2:25) Donge nyalo bedo maber ka waluwo yie mare?

Luo kitgi kod timbegi ok rach kaiyude mbuini to gima rach oriwo dhoudi moko nango?nikech luo nigi chikegi,kara koro chikegi onego owegi nikech dhoudigo onge chike magiluwo. Lukricitayo me cencwari me acel gutito kwena me Ker-ri wa i agikki lobo ducu. Yecu onyutigi ka ma myero gutit kwena iye dok otimo tango ma omiyo gupwonyo dano i leb pengi kikome. Jehovah omiyo botgi tekcwiny ki teko me kanyo aunauna magwar.
Yecu omiyo bot lakwena Jon ginanyuta i kom deyo pa Jehovah. I ginanyuta mukene, Jon oneno ka Ker me polo loyo Catan ki lobone matwal. Jon oneno ka Yecu loyo macalo Kabaka kacel ki luloc 144,000 ma giloyo kwede. Jon bene oneno ka lobo ducu lokke doko paradic ka ma dano ducu giworo iye Jehovah ki kuc dok ma gunote.

Weche medo bedo mapek ne riwruok mar Knut bang’ jagoro Wilson Sossion e tielo machielo ne oramo ni kata nade ok obi weyo bedo e apis kaka jagoro mar duolno.
Kane otwak ji jofwambo e boma ma Nairobi,Sossion oramo ni en e apis ayanga kendo obiro dhi nyime gi chenro mage e kom goro mar Knut.
Magi timore kata obedo ni moko kuom jo knut josebedo kadwaro mondo owuok e komno wira ni ne giseyiero Hesborn Otieno kaka jagoro manyien e yor kojolo.
Sossion ne olero ni oonge gi lweny kod ng’ato ang’ata e knut kendo obiro timo tije kaka pile.
Sossion ne oluongo romo e log tich mar Knut mar ne gwelo jotelo moko mondo okaw kuonde mane odong’ thuolo tok moko kuom jotelo ne dhi e yweyo tok tich.
Sossion ne olero ni en oonge gi lweny kod ng’ato ang’ata e duol no mar Knut,komedo ni bedo ne e siasa ok nyal mone timo tije e kom goro mar Knut.
Romo ni ne obedo ndalo 1 tok machielo mane onego timre e kind Knut kod TSC e wach medo lemo telo jopuonje ,ne ok obedo tok TSC ne wacho ni koko manie Knut gisani ne ok nyal miyo chenrono ne timre.

Acakki 22
Lubaŋa ociko Abraim pi tyero Icaka
1-I ŋe lok meno ducu, Lubaŋa otemo Abraim kun wacce ni, “Abraim!” En ogamo ni, “Ana ene.” 2-Owacce ni, “Kwany wodi Icaka, iter, en wodi acel keken, ma imaro-ni, wot kwede i lobo Moria, wek icit ityere kunnu, obed gitum awaŋa i kom got mo ma abititti ki kunnu.” 3Kit meno Abraim opuk odiko con, otweyo kom me bedo i wi kanane, okwanyo awobene aryo, ocito kwedgi, kacel ki wode Icaka; otoŋo yen me waŋo gitum, oa, okemo i kabedo ma Rwot otitte-ni. 4I ninome
... (604 chars skipped) ... 
kabedo ma Lubaŋa yam otitte, ci Abraim ocano keno tyer, ka ocano yen i wiye, otweyo wode Icaka, ci opyelo i wi keno, obuto i wi yen. 10Abraim otiŋo ciŋe, okwanyo pala me neko wode. 11Lamalaika pa Rwot olwoŋe ki i polo, kun wacce ni, “Abraim! Abraim!” En ogamo ni, “An atye ene.” 12Owacce ni, “Pe iket ciŋi i kom latin-nu, pe itim gin mo i kome bene; doŋ tin atyeko niaŋ atir ni ilworo Lubaŋa, pien pe itwona wodi, wodi acel keken, nen imiya.” 13Abraim otiŋo waŋe malo, ci oneno nyok romo tye i ŋeye m
... (604 chars skipped) ...
, pien ityeko woro doga.” 19Lacen Abraim odok cen bot awobene, ka gua kunnu, gudok kacel kwedgi wa i Beer-ceba; Abraim obedo i Beer-ceba.
Likwayo pa Nakor
20I ŋe lok meno ducu, gitero lok bot Abraim ni, “Nen, Mirika otyeko nywalo litino ki omeru Nakor: 21latin kayone Uj, ki Buj ominne, Kemuel won Aram, 22Keced, Kajo, Pildac, Jidlap, ki Becweri.” 23Becweri onywalo Labeka. Mirika onywalo Litino aboro ki Nakor omin Abraim. 24Dakone ma aŋeca, ma nyiŋe Reuma, onywalo bene Teba, Gakam, Takac ki Maaka.

IN MONO ingeyo kit ma kiyubo kwede cingi i yo me aura? Tika ingeyo tic ducu ma cingi twero tiyone?— Nen kong cingi. Gom nyig cingi. Kwany kong gin mo. Cingi twero timo jami mapol dok bene timogi maber. Mono ingeyo anga ma oyubo cingwa?—
En Ngat acel ma oyubo dogwa, umwa ki wangwa-ni. Lubanga, Won Lapwony Madit. Cwinywa mono pe yom ni Lubanga oketo wangwa?— Wangwa twero neno jami mapol. Watwero neno ature. Watwero neno lum ki polo ma bullu. Waromo bene neno lutino winyi ma gungamo doggi ka cam ca
... (1900 chars skipped) ... 
a tuku woko. Ento kot aye weko ature dongo. Dong ka waneno ature maleng, anga ma wabipwoyo?— Lubanga. Omyero wapwo anga ka wacamo nyig yen ki pot dek mamit?— Omyero wapwo Lubanga pien ceng ki kot ma mege aye weko jami dongo.
Ket kong ni ngat mo openyi ni, ‘Lubanga aye mono ocweyo dano kacel ki lee?’ Ibigamo ningo?— Bedo ber ka igamo ni: “Ada, Lubanga aye ocweyo dano ki lee.” Ento ka ngat moni pe ye ni Lubanga aye ocweyo dano kono? Ka en wacci lee aye olokke odoko dano kono? Baibul pe pwonyo kume
... (1900 chars skipped) ...
 jami mukene ma Lubanga ocweyogi. Dok bene watwero camo cam ma Lubanga omiyogi botwa.
Omyero wapwo Lubanga pi jami magi ducu. Ma dong loyo ducu, omyero wapwoye pi miniwa kwo. Ka ada wapwoyo Lubanga, ci wabitimo gin mo. Gin ango?— Wabiwinyo Lubanga, dok wabitimo gin ma en waco botwa i Baibul. I yo ma kit meno watwero nyutu ni wamaro Ngat ma ocweyo Jami ducu.
Omyero wami pwoc bot Lubanga pi jami ducu ma en otimo. Nining? Kwan gin ma kicoyo i Jabuli 139:14; Jon 4:23, 24; 1 Jon 5:21; ki Niyabo 4:11.

Wel 16
Jemo pa Kora, Datan ki Abiram
1-Kora wod pa Ijar, ma wod pa Kokat, wod pa Levi, kacel ki Datan ki Abiram awobe pa Eliab ki On wod pa Pelet, ma gin adek ducu gubedo likwayo pa Reuben, 2gutero dano ci gucito kwedgi i kom Moses, kacel ki lwak dano ma i kin jo Icrael, lutel wi lwak miya aryo ki pyerabic ma giyero ki i kin lwak mucokke, jo ma giŋene mada. 3Gucokke kacel i kom Moses ki Aron ci guwaco botgi ni, “Mewu doŋ okato kare! Pien jo magi ducu gin lwak maleŋ, gin ducu ki acel acel Rwot be

Laktar Amoth ne oguel kaka jakom board maduong mar WHO
Riuruok mochungne weche mag thieth e bwo piny mangima -World Health Organization -WHO- kawuono ne oguelo Director makojolo e migao mochungne yoore mag thieth e pachoka laktar Patrick Amoth kaka jakom board maduong mar riuruok mar WHO no
Magi ne oyangi kod jatend migao mochungne yoore mag thieth e riuruogno laktar Harsh Vardhan mane otimo lendono e romo mar 149 mar board mar riuruok mar World Health Organizationno
E dwe mar 5 mar higa mokalo , laktar Amoth ne oyier kaka jalup ker mar board maduong mar riuruok mar World Health Organizationno – e lemo mane odhi bede kuom higni ariyo

Ang’o momiyo onego atim exercise?
E pinje moko, rowere ok ohero timo exercise, tiende ni, ok gihero tiego dendgi, to mano keto ngimagi kama rach. Muma wacho maler niya: “Tiego del konyo.” (1 Timotheo 4:8) Ne ane weche ma luwogi:
Timo exercise nyalo miyo wawinj maber. Tiego del konyo e loso kemikol mag obwongo miluongo ni endorphins ma miyoga ng’ato bedo gi kue kod mor. Jomoko wacho ni exercise nyalo konyo ng’ato geng’o parruok.
“Ka aringo gokinyi, abedoga ma mor kendo atimoga gik mang’eny e odie
... (1153 chars skipped) ... 
a onge thuolo. “Adichga ahinya, anyalo mana yudo thuolo mar manyo chiemo maber kod nindo. Kata kamano, thuolo mar timo exercise to pod otama.”—Clarissa.
Bedo ma onge pesa mar dhi e gym. “Ka idwaro bedo gi del motegno kendo mayot, nyaka ichul pesa kuonde ma irieye del (gym) eka ginyalo yieni timo exercise.”—Gina.
Wach monego ipar:
Gima duong’ ma moniga timo exercise en mane? Loyo gino nyalo kawo kinde, kata kamano, ber mibiro yudo ng’eny miwuoro.
Anyalo timo ang’o mondo atim exercise mowinjore gi
... (1153 chars skipped) ...
hinya kuom tiego dendi, to konchiel ijwang’o “gik ma dwarore moloyo” e ngimani.—Jo-Filipi 1:10.
E wi mano, seche moko weche ma iparo ni ijiwigo mondo imed timo exercise, nyalo mana chwanyi. Nyako moro miluongo ni Vera wacho niya: “Ng’eny nyiri kanoga piche mag joma gidwaro ni gichalgo, kendo gijong’iyoga pichego kinde ka kinde sama giwinjo ka gijony gi timo exercise. Pimruok gi joma kamago nyosoga mana chunygi. En gima dwarore ni wabed gi chenro mar rito dendwa, to ok mana kaka wanenore gi oko.”

AMP ochung’ ni Antibody Mediated Prevention (Yadh Moriwo mar geng’o Tuo). Maen rieko mar miyo ji yadh antibodies mondo one kabende gibiro geng’o ji kwom yudo tuo mar AYAKI.
Somo mar AMP en rieko manyien machalore kod somo mamoko mosega tim e nonro mag dwaro sindand geng’o AYAKI. E somo machon mag sindande geng’o touché, ji yudo sindan mar geng’o tuo, kaeto warito mondo wane dendgi biro loso antibodies makedo kod AYAKI. E somoni, wabiro kadho hatua noendo, mondo wami ji yadh antibodies achiel kac
... (426 chars skipped) ... 
 en mar rucho tuo mar AYAKI. Pimo mag nonro osenyiso ni antibody marucho kaka VRC01 nyalo geng’o touché mang’eny mag AYAKI e piny mangima. Otimo maendi kuom riwore kuonde virus motiyogo e riwore kod sende mangima, kaeto ogeng’o touché. Somo mar AMP biro puonjo wa somo kabende VRC01 antibody biro geng’o tuo mar AYAKI kuom ji.
VRC01 / HIV Virus Attachment from HIV Vaccine Trials Network on Vimeo.

an maler iketoe tyub matin mar jwala e ler mar ching jasomo. Mfuko mar pi itweyo epol kaeto itudo gi pamp, mapimo kaka pi chwer kadonjo e ching ng’ato.
Jasomo yudo sindand kata pi ler (sindan ler).
Somoni itimo kod kampunde ariyo, kambi miyuongo ni the HIV Vaccine Trials Network kod the HIV Prevention Trials Network gi dho ngere. Kambe ariyo gi kod joma nitiere eklinige mag somoni tiyo kamoro achiel kod ji duto moriwore kodgi mondo giket adieri ni nonro ni owinjore kod chike gi timbe mag okanda.

PUONJ MAR MUMA: “Weuru bedo gi parruok e ngimau.”—Mathayo 6:25.
Tiend wechego en ang’o? Yesu nowacho wechego e twak ma nogolo e got. Kaluwore gi diksonari moro ma lero weche Muma, wach mitiyogo e dho Grik molok ni “bedo gi parruok” inyalo tigo kilero kaka “ng’ato winjoga nikech odhier, kata sama kech kaye, kata sama onyagre gi chandruoge moko moromogo e ngimane ma pile.” Wajoparorega ahinya sama waparo gik ma nyalo timore e kinde ma biro. Onge richo paro e wi gige ringruok mochuno kata e wi ngim
... (276 chars skipped) ... 
 kindewagi? Wabedo mariek sama waluwo paro ma Yesu nochiwono. Nikech ang’o? Jotim nonro moko wacho ni sama ng’ato nigi parruok ahinya yot mondo oyud tuoche mag adundo, ulcers, kata asthma.
Yesu nowacho gimomiyo ok onego waparre mokalo tong’. Parruok ok kony kata matin. Nopenjo niya, “Ng’ano kuomu ma kuom parruok nyalo medo bor mar ngimane kata mana gi bat achiel?” (Mathayo 6:27) Parruok ahinya e wi ngimawa ok nyal konyo kata medonwa gimoro amora e ngima. E wi mano, kinde mathoth gik moko ok dhig
... (276 chars skipped) ...
ny, kendo rwakoga yien me pap gi ber kamano, donge obiro miyo joma lame gadier gik ma gichando e ngima? (Mathayo 6:25, 26, 28-30) Mar ariyo, odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ ru gi mage. Yesu nowacho ni, “Kik uparru kuom kiny, nikech kiny nobed gi parruokne owuon.” Donge en adier ni “Odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ nigi chandruokne morome”?—Mathayo 6:34.
Sama waluwo paro ma Yesu nomiyowago, wageng’o hinyruok mwanyalo yudo. E wi mano, wabedo gi paro mokuwe, ma Muma luongo ni “kuwe mar Nyasaye.”—Jo-Filipi 4:6, 7.

joodbura mathurka kawuono igeno mar golo duoko mogik ewi osuru mowinjore juogi ewi modhi.
Written by Phenny Waga on September 20, 2018
Jood bura mathurka odiechieng makawuono igeno mar goyo ombulu ewi siro duaro mar ker mathurka migosi Uhuru Kenyatta kotenore kod osuru maromo kwan tamalo 18% migeno juogi ewi modhi mabuo thurka.
Ombulu mar paroni ne opedhi eod bura kod migosi Joseph Limo maen jaod bura ma Kipkelion East mabende en e jakom motelone kamati mochungne chenro mag omenda thurka.
Kabende oganda jokenya odiechieng makawuono oganda jo Kenya dhi ngeyochung margi kotenore gi meto enengo mar ngiewo modhi mopogore opogore thurka koriwo nyaka mano mar taya.
Wach mar medo nengo mar modhi mag petrol kod diesel thurka koriwo nyaka moo mar taya osemiyo oganda obedo kod pek mokalo kokaloe weche mag wuoth ,ngieo mwandu mopogore opogore makoro oketo ngima oganda kama tek miwuoro.
Yuak wuok kuom jopiny mankod nuengo mapiny mondo mi piny owacho otem odewgi nimar onge kaka ginyalo konyore kanengo mag mwandu nengogi

#GARIMOKINYIonMONDAY: Ekindeni ma oganda jokenya dhialo higni 10 nyaka ne sidh ayanga chike matayo piny Kenya, lokruoge mathoth mag dongruok oseneno katakamano jomoko bende pod nikoda penjo kabende osee tii e yoo madwarore gi chike mane jopiny okalo gi sironyo.

1. Iraŋo Were ochweyo piny?
Jehova ochweyo piny me tomiyo ji. Me a pecho mowan. Ri ameno, ji aryo ma Were otelo chweyo, Adam kodi Eva, kochwey jo bedo i polo. Were oido otyeko chweyo jomalaika bedo i polo. (Yobu 38:4, 7) Munyo Were otyeko chweyo Adam, dhano marapena, oketho go i ndelo milwoŋo ni Eden. (Chakirok 2:15-17) Jehova omito ni Adam kodi nyikwaye jowobedi i piny ka chil gi chil.
I chakirok, ndelo ma Eden kende amoido kabedo maŋon. Adam kodi Eva oido joripo nywoli jowopoŋi piny gi nyikway
... (465 chars skipped) ... 
, ongoye gima nyalo dhyero go. (Isaya 45:18) Odoko Were laloko piny me kabedo maber ri ji, paka atoŋa pere obedo wok i chakirok.
3. Were oloki nedi piny me kabedo maber?
Ka Yesu ochaki dhumo piny, odoko piny lalokere kabedo maber. I lweny milwoŋo ni Amagedon, Yesu bino telo jomalaika pa Were joworey woko ji jye ma jokitimi gima Were mito. Rumachien, Yesu latweyo Sitan oro 1,000. Ji pa Were jolaboth rupiri Yesu lakuro jo. Jolalimo kwo makirum i piny manyien.
4. Chandirok orumi keraŋo?
Were okwany
... (465 chars skipped) ...
oko two, ti, kodi tho.
5. Jomene ma jolabedo i piny manyien?
Joma timo gikipiny ma Were mito ama jolabedo i piny manyien. (1 Yohana 2:17) Yesu odhiro jofuonjirok pere dwaro jomamwol jowofuonji jo gikipiny ma Were mito. Pama Jehova dwaro ji ma jolabedo i piny manyien. (Zefaniya 2:3) I Kingdom Hall, kama Wajulizi pa Jehova jorom’iye lamo Were, ji jofuonjere nger ma jonyalo bedo chwo kodi mon mabeyo. Nyithindho kodi jonywol pajo jolamo Were kanyachiel kendo jofuonjere nger ma Baibul nyalo konyo jo.

Tito ranyuth ma EFRIS
EFRIS I dhoragem kendo I Boro obedo Electronic Fiscal Receipting and Invoicing Solution. Ma wa’ nyalo dwoko I Dhopadhola ni RYEKO ma nyien ma nyalo Nger ma Kwayo gi ndiko chul m’otimere I Chan ma kiwaka misolo ma piny g’atonga ma ryemo woko Teko ma makere gi misolo I mitan gi ndiko paka mitan kosa chul obedo.
Obedo ryeko ma nyien m’olony m’ioro ma ndiko paka mitan owotho t’ilewo gi kitipa ma chako misolo URA I sawa ago won. (Paka ripo) I’ripo oro men ma kompyuta m’ilwongo ni e-Invoicing luwo I Ka nwango wach ma URA gi miyo ngeyo manyatir tir GI Chan ma mitan (wok Chan man kidho I man) m’ilwongo ni (EFDs) GI ryeko man m’ilwongo ni Electronic Dispenser Controllers
(EDCs) Ma miyo kosa nwango Risit gi invoysi i ryeko ma nya kompyuta.
Kis Ka mitan otimere sano I oro ryeko moro jye ma makere gi EFRIS’ gi’ma thoth ma mako kwong mitan no kadho akadha tirtir ri URA ma wok gi risit Kodi invoysi.

Ere kaka wanyalo ng'eyo adiera ma opondo kuom Hemb Romo? Mana kuom ng'eyo injili mar pi kod Roho, ranyisi mar adier mar Hemb romo, ema nyalo miyo wawinjo kendo wang'eyo dwoko mar penjono
Kuom adier, kido mambulu, makwar, kod maralik motwang'kod usi mayom mong'aw e dho ranga laro mar hemb room nyisowa tich mar Yesu Kristo e ndalo mag Muma Manyien ma osewaro dhano. E yorni, wach Muma Macho mar hemb romo kod wach mar mar ndalo Muma Manyien chingni chalre, kaka katana motwang' maber. To, kuom hawi marach adier machalo kamano ose pondone Jo-Kristo mangeny magombo ng'eyo adiera kuom kinde malach.
Ka nobiro e pinyni, Yesu Kristo nobatisi kod Johana kendo nochwero rembe ewi msalaba. Kaok iwinjo kendo bedo gi yie kuom injili mar pi kod Roho, Onge ng'ato kuomwa manyalo fwenyo adier mopondo kuom wach hemb romo. Nyaka koro wapuonjre adier mar Hemb romo kendo wayie kod adiera mosefwenyore e usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar kaachiel gi law katana molos maber e ranga laru mar Tabernakel.

Chieng tich abich tarik 31 dweni oyangi kaka odiechieng yueyo mar hingo odiechieng nyasi mar Idd-Ul-Adha
Chieng tich 5 mar jumani maen tarik 31 mar dweni koro oyangi ni dhi bedo odiechieng yueyo ne pachoka mabende idendo gi dho bwana ni Public Holiday mar hingo odiechieng nyasi mar oganda jo islam mar Idd-Ul -Adha
Magi ne oyangi gi jatend migao mochungne arita kwee mapachoka laktar Fred Matiang’i
Kanomedowuoyo ewii wachno laktar Matiang’i nowacho ni nyasi duto mag hingo odiechieng Idd -Ul -Adhano ibiro mana timo koluwore gi chike mane oketi gi migao mochungne yoore thieth mag kedo kod midusi mar Coronavirus
Jatelono nowacho ni ik gibi duaro kata matin mondo dhano jodhungre kamoro achiel e yoo moro amora kowacho ni jii nyaka bi luu mana chike mane oketne dinde duto mapachoka mane mag gayo landruok mar tuono

Wayudo ni joma nigi dindegi ohero wuoyo e wi Muma. En adier ni wang’eyo ni ng’ato nigi ratiro mar yiero puonj moluwo kendo ok wachun ji gi wach ma walando.
Seche ma wawuoyo kuom wach din, watemo tiyo gi paro ma Muma chiwo ni wanyis ji “muolo
” kendo ka wami ji “luor
”. (1 Petro 3:15, 16) Wang’eyo ni jomoko biro tamore winjo wach ma wateronegi. (Mathayo 10:14) Kata kamano, ok wanyal ng’eyo kaka ng’ato biro rwako wachno kapok wawuoyo kode. Bende wang’eyo ni chal mar ngima ji jalokre.
Kuom ranyisi, ng’ato nyalo bedo modich ahinya maok onyal wuoyo kodwa, to chieng’ machielo owuoyo kodwa gi ilo. Kendo jomoko nyalo romo gi chandruoge manyien ma nyaka ginyagrego ma mi gidwar winjo puonj mar Muma. Omiyo, watemo wuoyo gi ji nyadinwoya.

Lango /1 Ento Kricito oto pirwa a nwang wan obalo; mannono nyuto kite mar ame Obanga tye kede bangwa. Ame pe ru ecuban me Kato otuno, Yecu onwongo ngeo ni caa mere dong oromo me weko lobo man pi dok bang Papo; En rik omaro jo mere ame tye i lobo man, omarogi tuno i agikki. Mom tye ngattoro ame tye kede mar adwong ame kato man, dano ijalo kwo mere pi awottere. Kede a ya dang i bang Yecu Kricito, acaden a genne, atin kao i akina jo oto, kede aloc obakki me wi lobo lung; Kwogo bed bang ngat a marowa, dok dang ogonyowa i twec me balwa kede remo mere. Pien Obanga rik omaro lobo amannono, omio Wode acel keken, me dano acel acel ame ye en kur rweny odoco, ento bed kede kwo a perakino nakanaka. Rwot rik con onyutte banga kun kobo ni: Eyo, an rik amro-wu ki mar me aperakino nakanaka; pi manono omiyo rik aywao-wu kede mar opong kede kica. /2 Mung me ngeo obanga abonge anyobanyoba moro, pire dit meicel; Rik en onyutte i kom, okwane ni kite atir pi Cuny Acil, omalaika te nene, orabo pire bang Orok, oye en i wi podo lung; ote tere malo i kwogo.

OD BURA MAR KISUMU OPUODHO BILL MA KENDO TENGE OMENDA MAR KEDO KODA MIDHIERNI MA APOYA
Written by Chrispine Okoth on November 7, 2018
OD BURA MA KISUMU E KINDE TWAK. PHOTO COURTESY.
BY JOWI RAYMOND.
Kwayo mar tiyo e twech achiel kaachiel koda luuruok gi chike matayo od bura ma Kisumu koroni to imed gol ne MCAs duto e kauntino.
Magi kaluwore gi okang’ mane oku koda ogai mar NASA moluor Raila Odinga e chuoyo aput mar kel thek e kind MCAs go to koda tend od burano kotelnegi koda spika margi moluor Onyango Oloo, jatend kweth mathoth Migosi Kenneth Onyango kaachiel koda ma en jagoo oporo Migosi Gad Olima.
Kane ogolo kwayo makamano Migosi Erick Agola mabende en achiel kuom kweth aput mar jokony spika e yor kojolo ne jokwayo MCAs wetene mondo ka joyie to olure gi mise mar nyayo kwe ma osechaki koda ogai margi moluor Odinga e bwo tend apisi mar jatend kweth mathoth m,abende ema ne omii chik mar tayo chenrono ka gikonyore kod apisi spika.
Magi timore mana e kinde ma koro chenro mag twak ne josechako duogo ayanga ka bende gikone to od burano ma Kisumu ne jopuodho chik madhi yie ne Migao mar omenda kokalo kuom budget matayo kaunti ma Kisumu ma bend ong’ere gi dho omombo ni Emergency Fund Bill ma en omenda ma ibiro tii godo e kedo koda midhierni ma apoya kaka mach, pii mayuero oganda e kinde koth mapek e kind midhierni mamoko.
Mae twak mane opedh e od bura koda jakom mar budget Migosi Steve Owiti ma bende enie MCA no ma Kolwa East.

Ka ne Musa ni e wi Got Sinai, Jehova nonyise ni oger hema moro makende ma ne Jo-Israel nyalo lamee. Hemano ne iluongo ni tabenakel. Ne en hema ma ne ginyalo dargo sa asaya.
Jehova nowacho ne Musa kama: ‘Nyis ji mondo gichiw gimoro amora ma nyalo konyo e gero tabenakel.’ Jo-Israel ne ochiwo dhahabu, fedha, mula, kod kite mamoko mabeyo. Ne gikelo bende yie jamni, pamba, piend jamni, kod gik mamoko mang’eny. Ne gichiwo gik mang’eny ahinya mochopo kama Musa nonyisogi niya: ‘Koro oromo! Kik umedi.’

Kanyo bende ne nitie mesa kod kendo miwang’oe ubani kata gik ma nigi suya mamit. E laru mar tabenakel ne nitie besen molos gi mula kod kendo maduong’ mar misango. Sandug singruok ne paro ne Jo-Israel kaka ne gisingore ne Jehova ni ne gidhi luwo chikene.

Dwoko ma Muma chiwo
Osenyis ji mang’eny ni ok yot ng’eyo ng’ama ne ondiko Muma. Muma to nyisowa maler ng’ama nondike. Kuonde moko e Muma chakre gi weche kaka “weche mag Nehemia,
” “weche ma ne ofwenyore ne Isaya,
” “wach Jehova ma ne obiro ne janabi Joel.
”—Nehemia 1:1; Isaiah 1:1; Joel 1:1.
Jondik Muma mang’eny oyie ni ne gindiko e lo Jehova, Nyasaye madier kendo ni en ema ne otayogi. Kuom ranyisi, jonabi ma nondiko Ndiko mag dho Hibrania nowacho mokalo ndalo 300 niya: “Jehova owacho kama.
” (Amos 1:3; Mika 2:3; Nahum 1:12) Jondiko moko noyudo wach Nyasaye kokalo kuom malaike.—Zekaria 1:7, 9.
Muma nondiki gi chwo madirom 40, kuom higni 1600 kama. Moko kuomgi nondiko buge mag Muma mokalo achiel. Inyalo wach ni Muma chalo gi laibrari moro matin moting’o buge 66. Muma nigi buge 39 ma gin Ndiko mag dho Hibrania kendo ging’ere kaka Muma Machon, bende en gi buge 27 ma gin ndiko mag dho Grik miluongo ni Muma Manyien.

Buogo mar biro wuoyo duol marito aluora nema ewi chich ni josiasa moko tiyo kode
Written by admin on January 14, 2021
By Dave Opiyo
Komiti mar pur kod lupo ei od bura mar senate obuogo mar biro wuoyo duol marito aluora nema ewi chich ni josiasa moko tiyo kode buogo joket mwandu.
Kane gi loso kinde mane gi timo limbe ekambi sukari mar kibos senator ma machakos boniface kabaka oloreni gin kaka komiti mar pur kod lupo gi ikre mar wuoyo oko duol mar nema.
Jakom mar komitino migosi enock wambua ma en senator ma kitui owachoni gi mor gi okang ma kibos oketo mar rito aluora.
Ka senator ma kakamega ne oseyo piny owacho kuom koso chiwo license ne kambi kibos mondo mi ochak medo ndhadho e sukari mawuok pinje ma oko.
Paro mane osir gi senator ma nandi samson cheregei

od buch senate chako nono wach kel thurka daktaeche mag piny cuba
Written by Phenny Waga on June 23, 2018
Od bura mar senate sani koro geto mar dhi luongo jatend migao mar thieth thurka mikapiny mar cuba.
Ogai mar jood ura mathoth eod bura mar senate migosi Kipchumba Murkomen kaachiel kod nyawadgi motelone jood bura manok migosi James Orengo wachoni okginyal weyo maokgi nono adiera mar wachno kokowuok kuom mikai Kariuki.
Migosi Murkomen wachoni weche moko osebedo ka fuong’ore ni laktechego ibiro bed kichulo osara mar shillings million achiel kuom dwe ka dwe kaluwore kod winjruok mane gichopoe.
Omedo leroni odbura mar senate ne odong’ oko ewachno man aka winjruok ne oyudo oseketi kaka laktachego ubiro chul kagitayo tijegi thurka.
Kabende owachoni odbura onogo mar senate osebedi kisumo pacgi kinde duto ahinya to kotenore kod kel mag laktechego eyore mag chualo thieth.
Wach mar kelo laktechego thurka osebedo kanyuolo paro buora mopogore kowuok kuom oganda thurka.i Cesily Kariuki enyim kamati mar thieth mathurka mondo ochiw ler mathoth kotenore kod wach mar kelo lakteche maromo 100 pachokae kowuokie

Photo courtesy, noc – K
Gi Odalo Fred
Nyandika Maiyoro maen jang’wech mathiring’inyi manosedhi eyweyo, sanikoro nyalo bwonjo tok kamati mar Olympic kata NOC – Kenya chiwo singo mar mako lwete ekindeni makoro two okete piny.
Jang’wech Nyandika sani kedo matek kod two mat Tuberculosis (TB) kamonywako nyaka ahonda mager, kendo osebedo kakwayo kony e yore mopogore opogore. Gi ekindeni, odhinyime gi yudo thieth e osuptal mar Christamarianne e county ma Kisii.
E higa mokalo, kamati nogo mar NOC nochako chiwo pwonj makende ne jong’wech duto mapachokaa mondo oneni gikungo bath omenda magiyudo mar neno ni gidak e ngima makare kagisedhi e yweyo.
Jang’wech Nyandika, nowuok jaloch e ng’wech mar mita 3,000 e higa mar 1953 ekinde ng’weyego mag Indian Ocean Games manobagi e piny Madagascar kocha.
Bende nochako ofwadho bandech piny Kenya ehiga mar 1956 e ng’weyego mag Melbourne Olympics.

MAGOHA DHI ROMO GI JOKANYO E WI YEPO SIKUNDE
JATEND MIGAO MAR SOMO NGIRE GEORGE MAGOHA, OWACHO NI OBIRO BAGO ROMO GI JOKANYO E SECTOR MAR SOMO MAR LOSO E WI YORE MINYALO YAWOGO SIKUNDE ADIMBA NE JOPUONJRE MANODONG PACHO.
NGIRE MAGOHA MA BENDE NOTIMO LIMBE E SIKUND PRIMAR MA UHURU GARDENS, MAR NO NO KAKA OLOS KOMBE, NOWCAHO NI KALENDA MAR PENJ BENDE OK BI LOKORE KENDO NI TARIK MAR YAW SIKUL ADIMBA IBIRO LANDO BANG ROMO MA KAMANO, PO NONO NI JOKANYO MANIE SECTOR MAR SOMO BIRO WINJORE.
MAGOHA BENDE OWACHO NI JONYUOL NYAKA KORO CHUL FEES MONDO MI JOPUONJRE OYUD IKRUOK MAKARE MOTELO NE PENJ MA KAMANO.
NOLERO NI PINY OWCAHO BIRO KONY JOPUONJRE MANIE ALUORA MA PII OPONGO SIKUNDE KOWACHO NI E KUONDE MOKO BENDE GISETERE HEMA.

Dwoko ma Muma Chiwo
Kuwe biro bedo e piny ok kokalo kuom kinda mar dhano to kokalo kuom Pinyruodh Nyasaye, ma en sirkal manie polo ma itayo gi Yesu Kristo. Ne ane gima Muma puonjo e wi geno majaberni.
Nyasaye biro miyo ‘lwenje orum nyaka giko piny,’ ka ochopo singo mare mar kelo “kuwe obed e wi piny e kind joma oyiego!”—Zaburi 46:9; Luka 2:14.
Pinyruodh Nyasaye biro locho e wi piny duto koa e polo. (Daniel 7:14) Obiro golo pogruok mantie e kind pinje ma en gima osekelo ywaruok mang’eny ahinya.
Yesu ma en Jaloch mar Pinyruodh Nyasaye, iluongo ni “Ruodh Kuwe,” kendo obiro neno ni “kuwe ok nowe medore ameda.”—Isaiah 9:6, 7.
Jo mohero dhawo ok noyienegi dak e bwo pinyruodh Nyasaye nikech ‘chuny [Nyasaye] osin kod ng’at mohero tim mager.’—Zaburi 11:5; Ngeche 2:22.
Nyasaye puonjo jotichne kaka ginyalo dak gi kuwe. Nikech puonjgo, Muma wacho ni ji biro ‘kawo ligengini ma gingo eka ginilosgo leu kwer, kod tongegi ginithedh ratonge: oganda ok noting’ ligangla ne oganda machielo, kendo ok ginipuonjre wach lweny nyaka chieng’.’—Isaiah 2:3, 4.
Gie sani, Joneno mag Jehova milionde puonjore kaka ginyalo kelo kuwe. (Mathayo 5:9) Kata bed ni wawuok e ogendini mopogore opogore kendo wadak e pinje makalo 230, ok wa dhaw gi ng’ato ang’ata.
Joneno mag Jehova puonjore yore mag dak gi kuwe gi jomoko

Onongo yam tye laco mo ma langolo ma bedo i doggola me ot pa Lubanga kun lego cente. Otyeno mo acel, en oneno Petero ki Jon ka gidonyo i ot pa Lubanga. En owaco botgi ni: ‘Wumiya kong lim mo ba.’ Petero owaco ni: ‘Atye ki gin mo maber loyo cente ma atwero mini. I nying Yecu, a malo iwoti!’ Petero okonye me a malo, ci laco-ni ocako wot! Lwak gubedo ki yomcwiny madwong adada pi tango man mumiyo dano mapol gudoko luye.

... (286 chars skipped) ... 
ero ki Jon, gin gucito bot lupwonnye mukene-ni ci gutito botgi gin mutimme. Wel dano ma guye obedo ka medde ameda. Nyeko omako Lucadukayo matek mumiyo gumako lukwena dok gubologi i buc. Yecu!’ Ento Petero ogamo ni: “Myero wawiny Lubanga makato dano.”
Kiniga omako lupwonye dini magi matek mumiyo onongo gimito neko lukwena woko. Ento Laparicayo mo ma nyinge Gamaliel oa malo ci owaco ni: ‘Wugwokke! Twero bedo ni Lubanga tye ki co-ni. Wun wumito lweny i kom Lubanga ce?’ Gujolo tamme. I nge goyo lukwena ki odoo, gucikogi doki ni gujuk tito kwena, ci dong guwekogi gucito. Ento meno pe ojuko tic pa lukwena. Gumedde ki tito kwena maber-ri ki tekcwiny, i ot pa Lubanga ki i paci pa dano.

Ŋeyi ma mako kwoŋ chokirok mawan. Nwaŋi ka chokirok mawan mani chiegin kodin.
Aŋo Matimere i Chokirok Mawan?
Wajulizi pa Jehova jochokere diryo kis sabiti to jolamo Were. (Joebrania 10:24, 25) I chokirok me, ma kis dhano nyalo bed’iye, wafuonjere Baibul gi nger ma wanyalo ketho gikipiny ma wafuonjere i tim.
I chokirok mawan mathoth ji jye jowodho paro, paka bedo i somero. Chokirok chako kendo to rumo gi wer kodi kwayo.
Ikiripi bedo Mujulizi pa Jehova nyaka tibino i chokirok mawan. Kis dhano nyalo bino. Ka bedo ma nono. Wakichoki pesa.

Icaya 39
Kejekia ojolo lukwena ma gua ki i Babilon
(2 Luker 20.12-19; 2 Tek 32.27-31)
1I kare meno kabaka me Babilon, Merodak-baladan wod pa Baladan, owinyo ni kabaka Kejekia kome lit; ci owcalo lukwena gutero waraga kacel ki mot bote, pien onoŋo doŋ bene owinyo ni twone ocaŋ woko. 2Kejekia ojologi maber, ocako nyuto botgi or kano Limme ducu; guneno ryal ki jabu, aŋwece, moo me wel, ki ot kano jami lwennye ducu, onyuto botgi gin ducu ma onoŋo tye i ot kano jami mere. Pe tye gin mo ma odoŋ ma en pe onyuto botgi ma onoŋo tye i ode ki i lobo ducu ma onoŋo tye i te locce. 3Lacen lanebi Icaya obino bot kabaka Kejekia, openyo ni, “Jo-nu guwacci lok aŋo? Gin kono gua ki kwene?” Kejekia ogamo ni, “Gua i lobo mabor, gua wa i Babilon.” 4Icaya dok openye ni, “Guneno gin aŋo ki i odi?” Kejekia ogamo ni, “Gutyeko neno jami ducu ma tye i oda; pe tye gin mo ma odoŋ ma tye i odi kano limma ma pe anyuto botgi.”
5Icaya dok owaco bot kabaka ni, “Koŋ doŋ iwiny lok ma Rwot me mony owaco: 6Nen ba, kare doŋ cok romo, ma jami ducu ma i odi, ki ma yam kwarini gukano nio wa onyoo, gibiterogi woko wa i Babilon; pe tye gin mo ma bidoŋ kadi ki acel, man Rwot ma owaco. 7-Ki awo beni mogo bene, ma in inywalogi, gibiterogi woko bene, gibikolo mangi woko, ci gidoko lutic i gaŋ kal me Babilon.” 8Kabaka Kejekia oniaŋ ni kuc bibedo tye i kare me locce laboŋo alokaloka mo, meno aye gin mumiyo en owaco bot Icaya ni, “Lok pa Rwot ma iwaco-ni ber mere.”

Od Romo moro amora mar Joneno mag Jehova oting’o nying maler mar Nyasaye. Omiyo, waneno ni en migawo makende rito odno obed maler, konenore maber maonge kama okethoree kendo wakawo migawono kaka gima duong’ e lamo marwa. Ji duto nyalo konyo e rito Od Romo.
Chiwri mondo ikony e timo ler bang’ chokruok. Bang’ chokruok moro amora, owete gi nyimine timo ler mawiye wiye e Od Romo mondo giweye ka ochanore maber. Dichiel e juma, itimo ler mong’ith ne Od Romo. Jaduong’-kanyakla kata jakony-tich moro tayo tijno kendo kinde mang’eny oluwo chenro moting’o tije sie monego otim. Kaluwore gi gima dwarore, ji chiwore mondo giywech, giluok dier ot, giywe buru, gichan kombe, giluok choche, giwang’ yugi, kata gitim ler oko mar Od Romo. Iyango odiechieng’ achiel e higa mar timo ler e okang’ maduong’. Wapuonjo nyithindwa miyo karwa mar lamo luor kuom tiyo kanyachiel kodgi e timo ler.—Eklesiastes 5:1.
Chiwri mondo ikony e loso kuonde mokethore e Od Romo. Higa ka higa, inono adimba chal mar Od Romo, iye gi oko. Kaluwore gi nonro mitimono, iloso kuonde mokethore kinde ka kinde mondo Od Romo onen maber, to mano konyo kik keth pesa. (2 Weche mag Ndalo 24:13; 34:10) Od Romo maler kendo morit maber en kama owinjore gi lamo Nyasachwa. Kuom riwo tijni lwedo, wanyiso kaka wahero Jehova kendo wahero karwa mar lamo. (Zaburi 122:1) Mani bende miyo wabedo gi nying maber e alworawa.—2 Jo-Korintho 6:3.
Ang’o momiyo ok onego wajwang’ karwa mar lamo?
Gin chenro mage mitimo mondo Od Romo osik ka ler?

WI LUBELE—ME AKWANA I KACOKKE Mai 2020
Magajin man tye ki pwony me anyama i Julai 6–Agucito 2, 2020.
Pwony me anyama me 19: Julai 6-12, 2020. Watye ka neno lanyut ma moko ni lok pa lanebi Daniel i kom ‘kabaka ma tung kumalo’ ki ‘kabaka ma tung kupiny’ tye ka medde ki cobbe. Watwero moko ni lok meno tye ka cobbe nining? Dok pingo mitte ni waniang lok pa lanebi man kore ki kore?
Lok pa lunebi i kom ‘kabaka ma tung kumalo’ ki ‘kabaka ma tung kupiny’ tye ka cobbe i kare ma rom ki lok pa lunebi mukene. Lok pa lunebi magi gimoko nining ni lobo man dong cok gik?
Pwony me anyama me 20: Julai 13-19, 2020. Anga ma obedo ‘kabaka ma tung kumalo’ i kare-ni, dok kibijwere nining? Ngeyo lagam me lapeny meno twero jingo niyewa dok konyowa me yubbe pi atematema ma wabikato ki iye macok cok-ki i anyim.
Pwony me Anyama me 21: Julai 20-26, 2020. Pwony man bidongo pwocwa pi Jehovah ki pi mic mogo ma en ominiwa. Bikonyowa bene me nyamo lok ki jo ma gikalo akala ka Lubanga tye.
Pwony me Anyama me 22: Julai 27–Agucito 2, 2020. I pwony mukato-ni, wanyamo lok i kom lonyo ma Lubanga ominiwa ma waneno ki wangwa. I pwony man, wabiketo tamwa tutwalle i kom lonyo ma pe watwero nenone ki kit ma watwero nyuto kwede pwocwa pigi. Pwony man bene bidongo pwocwa pi Lubanga Jehovah, ma en aye lami mic magi ducu.

TIT BOTGI NI AMAROGI
“Lubanga omaro wilobo, oweko omiyo wode acel keken ni, ni ngat ma bibedo ki niyee i kome, pe bilal ata, ento binongo kwo me labednaka.” Jon 3:16
Lubanga bene mito bedo ki ot, ci dong oweko wabedo lutino ne; en pe mito ni wabed ka kwo calo lutino matino, ento en mito ni myero wawor en. En mito ni wagen en, wajenge, ka wamar en, wek en bene omar wan. En mito ni wabed ki cwiny matir i kome, dok bene wabed ki wat matir ikome.
Jo mukene gicwalo Jon 3:16 i yoo mabor adada. Eyo, ka i lok ada, Yecu oto pi wilobo. Ento pe oto pi dano lumuku. Ento oto pi ngat acel acel. Oto pi in!
Ka onongo ibed ngat acel keken i wilobo en, kono bene pud onongo can ka oto pi in; pien Lubanga maro in ki mar me labednaka. Inino mo acel, onongo atye ka dwoyo mutoka, ci Lubanga olok kweda, kun owaco ni: “Joyce in i bedo tong wanga” An onongo pe angeyo ni pwony ma kit meno twero nonge i Baibul. Ci Catan obino ki tung ku ngeya ka owacca ni: “Ento meno pe obedo wakke ma tere peke?”

Jago moro ma hike romo 68 ma iluongo ni Jared Jagongo Oringo mawuok egwenge ma Newa, Newa sub location ei kisumu west subcounty ne omonji koda jo njore ariyo odiechieng manyoro kar saa abiriyo mar odiechieng ma onege ma othoo gi kanyo kanyo,kaa jo njore go ne omonje eseche mane obeto puothe kuma ne gi kawo opanga mane Jalno oriko Beto godo ma gitong’o godo wiye.
Wach makama Koro oyangi Koda county commissioner ma Kisumu migosi Samuel Anampiu mane oyango ni lipot makamano ne ochwal Koda min od jal maosenindo no ka owacho ni jo njore go ne oritore Koda silaha mag jembe Kuma ne gimonjie wuon ode ma gichwee ginege Koda opanga mane oriko obeto godo.
Migosi Anampiu bende lero ni miyo no ne owinjo koko eseche mane en epuodho kendo ka ne Oringo mar dhii konyo to Jo njore go ne ogoye koda jembe mane gitingo kendo bende ne obet lwete Kuma ne oring kode e Hospital ma Miranga Kuma miyo no ne othiethi ma odok dala ka chuore to ne oter ekar Kano ringre jomo othoo ma Jaramogi Oginga Odinga Teaching and Referral Hospital ka rito bero.
Ne oyango ni nyaka giesani gisemako Jo njore ariyo go kendo kiny ne tergi e doho gi ketho mar nek.

Jawing juma megu mi Kasese District iotmoko cik, Florence Kabugho odaru miyu cwak ni awia ma otimu maber niloyu I penji mi daru klasi 7 ku mufalisi, suka mi um man balangiti. Ewacu awia kwan 18 ne ceke oai I sukuru ma tuc iigi tek I Busongora North County.

... (155 chars skipped) ...

Charles Maate Masanduku, jawii kom LC3 pi tejagu mi Kyabarungira onyutu mic ne callo wangu ich ma ewacu kudu nia enu otiye wang mir acel ma jamok cik otimu kit lembe makumenu I kabedo migi.

... (155 chars skipped) ...
u mi secondary.
Manke, Zulaika Kikusa, jawii juponji mi Bughendero Primary School, onyutu nia ku wel awia mapol ma gitiye kudu, sukuru ma otiye I kabedo ma got got gibe nenu peko pa gwoko lengu.
Ewacu pi lapor, Bughendero primary school royu nying awia makado 1,000 enke, gitiye ku udi kony 4 kende man awia omako oryey line ka gicidu kanongo kony mabor.
Kikusa okwayu jamok cik ne nitiyu kud ongu manenu lembe pa ponjiri i district mi Kasese man tela pa district mi yubu lengu pa awia ku pa juponji.

Jehova nonyiso Gidion kama: ‘Abiro miyo Jo-Israel olo jowasikgi. Kata kamano, nikech in gi jolweny mang’eny, unyalo po kuparo ni un e muloyo lwenyno. Nyis ng’ato ang’ata ma luor mondo odog dala.’ Jolweny 22,000 ne odok dala, kendo 10,000 kende e ma nodong’. Kae to Jehova nowachone kama:

Nyathii moro ma wuoyi koro to dhii timo penj mar KCPE e od thieth ma Jaramogi Oginga Odinga Teaching and Referral Hospital
Written by Dave Opiyo on March 22, 2021
Nyathii moro ma wuoyi koro to dhii timo penj mar KCPE e od thieth ma Jaramogi Oginga Odinga Teaching and Referral Hospital tok kane giyudo masira mar apaya okinyi makawuono eseche mane gidhii skul.
Rowere go ma achiel kuomgi en nyako kachiel kod mano ma wuoyi somo e skul primary ma St.Pauls Kanyakwar ka nyathino manyako to ne okoyudo hinyruok ahinya kendo ne ogol maa odokie skul ka mano ma wuoyi to ne oyudo hinyruok mokalo kama ne oyangi Koda laktar Abdi Kadir.
Kaluore kod jataa chenro mar duol mandiko jopuonj mikayi Nancy Macharia,ne owacho ni nyathii no mawuoyi dhiyo Timo penj mare e od thieth no.
Direkta ma ochungne weche mag Somo e county ma Kisumu migosi Isaac Atebe ne oyango ni nyathino idhiyo mii penj od thieth ka nyaka giesani odhii maber.
Ocpd ma Kisumu central migosi Peter Katam ne oyango ni gibiro chiwo arita kwee ne nyathino nyaka chop otieki Timo penj mare.

orengo onyiso mudavadi gi wetangula mondo obed kodgi eachiel .
Written by Phenny Waga on May 1, 2018
Migosi James Orengo maen jatend kweth manok eod bura mar senate okone nyagile mag NASA Mudavadi kod nyawadgi Moses Wetangula nigin komarach eyore mag siasa ahinya to maokelo riwruok ekind ker Kenyatta kod moluor Raila Odinga.
Okenegi mondo giwere gi siasa moko maokbikonyogi kendo giriwre eparo achiel mar kelo dongruok ne piny Kenya koriwo nyaka bedoe achiel mana kaka ne otim kod Migosi Odinga kokaloe mosruok ekinde kod ker Kenyatta.
Magi ne owacho egwege ma Yala e Gem Sub Kaunti Siaya Kaunti ekinde nyasi mar alam mane otim ekanisa mar Yala Catholic kama oleroni kinde duto,nyangile ariyo mag Nasa ariyogo osebedo kayudore eobadho marach sa asaya maitimo lokruok moko makelo dongruok thurka.
Okwayogi mondo gisir paro mar kelo lokruok thurka ne oganada kbende oknegi ni moluor Raila osesingonegi niokobi loso kotenore kod yiero maduong’ mahik 2022.Omedoni pogruok mikelo kod jodito ariyogo nyiso mana kido marach ne piny Kenya.

Kudni moro manyayo tuo mar Ebola koro yangoreni oyudi epiny mar Sierra Leone etielo machielo.
Maeni en ranyisi mar tuono nenore epinyno bang igni 2 mane tuono ne onenore mabende ne oweyo oganda alfu 11,000 kane owito ndimagi epinje mag Africa ma Imbo.
Kata kamano kudni moyang kak Bombali ma jotim nonro yangeporeni nyalo donjo nyaka edend dhano, pok oyangi kabende nyalo bedo kod oteku mar nyayo tuo onogo mar Ebola kod onyalo mamalo.
Amara Jambai maen jatelo mag weche thieth epiny no lero ni osechak tim nonro mar yango ka ponono tuono osedonjo kuom oganda kaka yorno mar kedo kod landruok mare.

Kinde ma piny uru kugweno mi ceng’ kas’abic, gicokiri kendo, copere pilembe gibemito junen nia pido marac ma gitimo ku diewor utie lembe ma kakare. E jukelo Yesu
... (1317 chars skipped) ... 
m uyec, e erwadu ie ung’eny dra iwi cana.—Tic mi Jukwenda 1:17, 18.
Saa ma jutero Yesu i pacu pa Pontio Pilato nwang’u fodi piny ubelero alera. Re Juyahudi m’utere kuca giceriri woko. Giparu nia ka gimondo i pacu pa Pilato ma tie ngo Jayahudi, gibicido. Eno copo cerogi ku camu cam urwonde i nindo 15 mi Nisan, ma tie ceng’ ma kwong’a mir agba mi Kwen ma thobi mbe i ie; agba maeno tie thenge acel ma zoo mi saa mi Kadhukuwijo.
E Pilato wok ibang’gi man epenjogi kumae: “Wukelo adote ang’o kum ng’atu
... (1317 chars skipped) ...
sari?’ Saa moko nyo Yesu umito ekenyang’ ikum lembe ma Pilato udaru winjo ku nyinge, pieno epenje kumae: “Iwacu lembuni giri kadi jumange yero pira iri?”—Yohana 18:33, 34.
Pilato ugam udwoko wec m’unyutho nia eng’eyo ngo lembe moko iwi Yesu, re ebemito eng’ei, eyero kumae: “An a Jayahudi?” Man emedo wec ma e: “Thek mu giwu ku julam ma dongo gikeli i bang’a: itimo ang’o?”—Yohana 18:35.
Saa ma Yesu ubedwoko lembe ni Pilato, eketho peko iwi Ker, man ma jiji mbe lembe m’eyerone uwang’u i Pilato lii.

PILE, ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomwa diher ni ji ong’eye kaka ng’ama ber. Kata kamano, bedo ng’ama ber e piny marachni ok en gima yot. Thoth ji sani gin “joma ok ohero gik mabeyo.” (2 Tim. 3:3) Ok gidwar luwo chike mag Jehova. Kar mano, ‘giluongo rach ni ber, kendo ber ni rach.’ (Isa. 5:20) Seche moko bedo ng’at maber nyalo bedo matek nikech yo ma ne wapon-go kod gik mosetimorenwa e ngima. Mano nyalo miyo wabed gi paro kaka mar Anne * ma osetiyo ne Jehova kuom higni mathoth to pod owacho kama: “Pod tek
... (3264 chars skipped) ... 
matut, wapong’o chunywa gi gik mabeyo e wi Nyasaye kod dwache. Mano miyo wabedo gi gik mathoth mabeyo ma wanyalo tiyogo bang’e.—Luka 6:45; Efe. 5:9.
Mar adek, watimo duto ma wanyalo mondo waluw ranyisi mag joma notimo ‘gik mabeyo.’ (3 Joh. 11) Nitie ranyisi mathoth e Muma ma wanyalo luwo. To ranyisi maberie mogik en mar Jehova gi Yesu. Kata kamano, pod nitie jomamoko ma notimo gik mabeyo ma wanyalo luwo ranyisigi. Ariyo kuomgi ma wanyalo paro mapiyo gin Tabitha gi Barnaba. (Tich 9:36; 11:22-24) 
... (3264 chars skipped) ...
imbena beyo kendo ok atim gik ma kelona wich-kuot.”
Gima duong’ momiyo wadwaro bedo gi kido mar ber, en ni bedo gi kidono miyo wamoro Jehova. Kata ka po ni ji mang’eny ok ne gik ma watimo, Jehova to neno. Ong’eyo gik mabeyo duto ma watimo kod ma waparo. (Efe. 6:7, 8) Mano kelonwa gueth mane? Muma wacho kama: “Jehova mor gi ng’at maber.” (Nge. 12:2, NW) Omiyo, watemuru bedo gi kido mar ber. Jehova singonwa niya: “Duong’, gi pak, kod kuwe nobedie kuom ng’ato ang’ata ma timo gik mabeyo.”—Rumi 2:10.

ngeto mar bura momakne migosi oyamo igeno tim saa asaya .
Written by Phenny Waga on September 11, 2018
Doho ma Homa Bay igeno mar chiwo ng’eto saa asaya kowuok sani ewi bura manomakne jating’ ndai mar governor ma Migori moluor Okoth Obado, mano Micheal Oyamo, Oyamo osebedo kitudo e okang’ mamalo gi nek mar mosenindo nyadendi Sharon Otieno ma yande tiegore e mbalariany ma Rongo.
Odiochieng’ manyoro jang’ad bura e doho ma Homa Bay mikai Lester Simiyu , nogolo chil ne tesend obila ma Homa Bay mondo odhinyime gi geng’one Micheal Oyamo nyaka odiochieng’ makawuono kuma idhing,adne bura.
Dohonogo bende nowacho ni jii adek kende ema ibiro yienegi timo limbe e od angech mar mar neno Oyamo kamabende neomedo ni owadgi oyamo manyinge George oyamo kaachiel gi okindene ariyo bende omii thuolo twak gi achijno.
Jogo manomako buraonogo kotelnegi kod migosi Tom Imbali nokwayo doho mondo omedgi thuolo mar timo nonro, to katakamano okinde mag Oyamo nowacho ni geng’one achijno e stesend obila biro mana rocho ratiche.

1. Pingo omyero wawor Lubanga?
Lubanga me ada en aye Lacwe jami ducu. En Lubanga ma bedo nakanaka. (Jabuli 90:2) En aye obedo Won kwena maber me Baibul. (1 Temceo 1:11) Kit macalo Lubanga aye ngat ma omiyowa kwo-ni, omyero wawor en keken.
2. Lubanga tye ki kom ki kit ango?
Pe tye dano mo ma oneno Lubanga pien Lubanga en Cwiny. Cwiny obedo kit kwo ma dok rwomme tye lamal makato cwec ducu me lobo ma gitye ki kom. (Jon 1:18; 4:24) Ento kono, watwero niang kit nyo tam pa Lubanga ki i jami ma en ocwe
... (574 chars skipped) ... 
i “Jehovah.” Jo mukene gilwongo ni “Yawe.”
Kikwanyo nying Lubanga woko ki i pol pa Baibul ci kileyo ka kare ki nying me dog tic calo Rwot nyo Lubanga. Ento i kare ma kicoyo Baibul, nying Lubanga onongo tye iye tyen 7,000 kulu. Yecu oweko dano ongeyo nying Lubanga i kare ma en opwonyogi lok i kom Lubanga.
4. Jehovah tika paro piwa?
Kit ma pekki tye mapol ata-ni mono nyuto ni Jehovah pe paro piwa? Jo mukene giwacci en aye lakel peko i kom wan dano, ento man pe lok ada.
Lubanga omiyowa twero me mok
... (574 chars skipped) ...
t Lubanga nining?
Jehovah kwayowa me nyikke cok bote ki lega bote. En maro wan ducu ki acel acel. (Jabuli 65:2; 145:18) En mito timiwa kica. En neno kit ma watute kwede me yomo cwinye, kadi bed kare mukene wapoto. Pi man, kadi bed watye ki roc, pud watwero nongo yomcwiny me bedo ki wat macok ki Lubanga.
Kit macalo Jehovah aye omiyowa kwo-ni, myero wamare makato ngat mo keken. (Marako 12:30) Ka imedde ki nyutu mar-ri pi Lubanga ki pwonyo lok i kome kun itimo gin ma cwinye mito, ibinyike cok bote.

Amosou kamoro amora ma untie. Mara en miyou gweth kochakore e higa manyien. Kendo akwayo Nyasach Rabala gi Dwe mondo ogwedhu kendo ogol chan kuomu, mondo luetu obed gi mwandu mogundho. Kendo amedo kuayo Nyasaye omiu teko ubed jo kinda, mondo gimoro amora ma ukete lwetu olokre muandu.

1, 2. Lapeny ango ma myero ipenye kwede, dok pingo pire tek?
I KWANNI me Baibul, dong ipwonyo ni dano mapol ma giwaco ni giworo Lubanga kara gipwonyo nyo gitimo jami ma Lubanga dag. (2 Jo Korint 6:17) Man oweko Jehovah cikowa me a woko ki i dini goba, ma kilwongo ni “Babilon Madit.” (Niyabo 18:2, 4) Ngo ma ibitimone? Ngat acel acel myero omok tamme, dok omyero wapenye kekenwa ni, ‘An mono amito woro Lubanga i yo ma en mito, nyo amito medde ki yo ma abedo ka woro en kwede con?’
2 Ka dong ia woko 
... (4099 chars skipped) ... 
 ki dini goba? (Icaya 65:11, 12) En pe cwako. Meno aye tyen lok mumiyo pe wakwero nino me nywal nyo nino madito mogo ma kubbe ki dini goba.
KA MA NINO MADONGO OCAKKE IYE MONO PIRE TEK?

11 Jo mukene gingeyo ni Karama ki nino madongo mukene-ni gucakke ki i tim pa lukamfiri, ento pud gimedde ki kwerone. Gitamo ni nino madito miyogi kare maber me bedo ki jo me odigi. Meno mono kit ma in iwinyo kwede? Miti me bedo
... (4099 chars skipped) ...
o ki i Baibul?
19 Lubo woro me ada bene kwako tito lok ma ipwonyo ki i Baibul bot jo mukene. Dano mapol gitye ki tur cwiny pi jami maraco ma tye ka timme i lobo-ni. (Ejekiel 9:4) Twero bedo ni ingeyo jo mogo ma giwinyo kumeno. Tit botgi pi gen ma mwonya ma tye i anyim. Ka ibedo tye i cokke pa Lukricitayo dok itito bot jo mukene lok ada ma ipwonyo ki i Baibul, ci pe dong ibibedo ki miti me lubo dini goba ki kwerre. Itwero bedo labongo akalakala ni Jehovah bigoyo laane i tuteni me wore i yo matir.

WECHE DOHO IDHI KET E MBUI
OGAI MAR DOHO JUSTICE DAVID MARAGA, OLANDO KAWUONO NI BAD MIGAO MAR DOHO BIRO CHAKO TIYO GI CHENRO MA NYASANI MAR KETO WECHE MAG DOHO E YOR DIGITAL KAKA ACHIEL KUOM OKENGE MAG KELO LOKRUOK E BAD MIGAO MAR DOHONO.
MARAGA WACHO NI CHENRO MA KAMANO BIRO NYWAKO NDIKO OBOK MAG DOHO E COMPUTER MONDO MI JOKENYA DUTO OBED GI THUOLO MAR NENOGI. NOLERO NI CHENRO MA KAMA NOCHAKORE GI NAIROBI, KOWACHO NI OTIYO MABER ENDO ONEGO OCHWALE KUONDE MAMOKO MA PACHO KAE.
KANOLOSO E DHOOD DOHO MA OYUGIS E SACH YAW AYANGA DOHO ANYIENMANOMUONYO SILING MILLION 109, MARAGA NOWACHO NI GISEKETO OKENGE MAKARE MAR CHAKO CHENRO MA KAMANO.
MARAGA NOWUOTHO GI JAOD BURA MA KASIPUL ONGONDO WERE, REGISTRAR MAR BAD MIGAO MAR DOHO ANNE AMADI KOD JANGAD BURA MA HOMABAY JOSEPH KARANJA GI COUNTY COMMISSIONER MA HOMABAY MOSES LILAN E KIND MAMOKO.

PWONY mukato-ni onyuto kit ma jami mogo maraco ma timme i kwo twero weko kwo doko tek ma pe kanye. Ka itye ka kanyo peko mo, itwero bedo ka pennye kekeni ka kwo konye tye nyo ka ngat mo paro piri. Bed ki gen ni Lubanga paro pi canni. Piri tek bote.
Ngat ma ocoyo Jabuli 86 otito pi genne i kom Lubanga ni: “I kare ma atye i can akok boti, pien igamo doga.” (Jabuli 86:7) Ento iromo bedo ka penye ni, ‘Lubanga bigamo legana nining “i kare ma atye i can”?’

Watye ki Gen pi Anyim Maber
“Lubanga con omaro lobo kumeno, omiyo iye Wode acel keken, wek dano ducu ma ye en owek to, ento obed ki kwo ma pe tum.”—Jon 3:16.
TAM KONG: Piri tek mada bot Lubanga ma oweko en omiyo Wode Yecu macalo gityer piri. Gityer man mini gen me bedo ki kwo me yomcwiny nakanaka. *
Kadi bed itye ki par dok kwoni nen calo konye pe, kwan lok pa Lubanga i yo matut wek idong niye i kom cikke pa Lubanga. Man biweko ibedo ki yomcwiny kacel ki gen ni kwo konye tye.

jopuonjre maromo 64,000 madonjo embaliariany idhi chiwnegi hola mag somo .
Written by Phenny Waga on September 6, 2018
Board mochungne siro somb jopuonjre thurka mar Higher Education Loans Board igeno ni dhi chiwo hola ne jopuonjre makwangi romo 64,700 mariworegi mbalariany mag piny owacho mathurka ethuolo mar jumbe 2.
Jopuonjre manyien machako riwore gi jowetegi etiegruok mopgore opogore embalariany mathurka gin mago makoro osechako donjo kuonde tiegruokgo ejumani.
Jopuonjre makwangi romo 69,151 thurka ne oyudo grade mayienegi riwore gi mbalariany mathurka mag piny owacho kod mag jii giwegi.
Boardno leroni jopuonjre madhi yudo omenda mapiny mogik dhi yudo shillings 42,000 kuom moro kamoro kamago magin kiye mok nyal idhi chiwonegi  maromo Sh60,000 kod basari maromo 8,000 kuom moro kamoro.
Mago mogik sidhnegi ogudu mag tiegruok bende ibiro chiwonegi omenda maromo Sh400 million esiro sombgi.

Ka latin aye oyabo doggola, omyero wapeny me lok ki lunyodone. Man nyuto woro pi lawigi. (Car 6:20) Ka latin ojolowa i ot, omyero pe waye. Ka lunyodone gipeke gang, omyero wadwog lacen.
Ka latin-ni dong dit dit, ma gwok nyo tye ki mwaka 15 me o 19, pud pore piwa me penyo pi lunyodone. Ka pe gitye paco, waromo penye ka lunyodone giye ni en aye oyer gin akwanane. Ka giye, ci waromo miye gin akwana mo kun bene wanyutte jw.org.
Ka idok cen ka limo bulu mo ma onyuto miti, omyero wapeny me rwatte ki lunyodone. Man biminiwa kare me tito tyen lok mumiyo walimogi, kun wanywako tam me ryeko dok ma genne ma Baibul miyo bot jo me ot. (Jab 119:86, 138) Ka wanyuto woro pi lunyodo, man bimiyo caden mucwiny dok twero miniwa kare mukene me nywako kwena maber ki lupaco meno.

YEHOVA tie ‘Jacwic mi polo ku ng’om,’ dhanu ceke mi ng’om ginen nyanok mandha i wange; ginen calu pi ma ton tok kud i dhu agulu. (Zaburi 115:15; Isaya 40:15) Kadok watie nyanok magwei i wang’ Yehova de, Zaburi 145:18, 19 uyero nia, ‘Yehova ni ceng’ni ku dhanu ceke m’ulwong’e. Ni dhanu ceke m’ulwong’e i lemandha.’ Kenen rwom madit maeno ma watie ko! Yehova ma en e Jacwic

ebiwinjowa kadok ng’atu moko mange mbe m’ubewinjo de.
11. Kekwan lembe moko ma wacopo nirwo pigi ibang’ Yehova.
11 Wacopo rwo pi lembang’o? Wacopo rwo pi gin moko ci m’urombo ku yeny pa Yehova. Biblia yero kumae: “Tek wakwayu gin moko calku yeny ma ie yenyo, ewinjowa.” (1 Yohana 5:14) Nyo wacopo kwayu pi yeny mwa ma segi? Eyo. Nirwo ibang’ Yehova copo bedo ve niweco ibang’ jarimo ma ceng’ni. Wacopo koro ni Yehova lembe moko ci ma nwang’ere i paru mwa man i adundewa. (Zaburi 62:8) Wacopo kwayu ni
... (4664 chars skipped) ...
 nia andha waketho cwinywa iwi gin ma waberwo pire ibang’e. (Luka 11:5-10) Saa moko Yehova copo dwoko wang’ rwo mwa i kite ma waparu ngo. Ku lapor, wacopo rwo pi peko moko ma tek, ento kakare nidaru pekone, ecopo mio iwa kero mi cire acira.
20. Pirang’o wacikara nirwo ibang’ Yehova saa ceke?
20 Watie ku rwom madit akeca mi rwo ibang’ Yehova! Wacopo bedo m’umbe jiji nia ebiwinjowa. (Zaburi 145:18) Bende, ka wamedara nirwo ibang’ Yehova saa ceke niai kud i adundewa, mer mwa ibang’e bigam doko tek.

Ahab gi Jezebel nopong’o Israel gi lamo mar Baal, kendo ne ginegoga jonabi mag Jehova. Jehova ne okawo okang’ mane? Ne ooro janabi Elija ir Ahab gi wach moro.

dwaro. Ka Jehova e Nyasaye madier, to luweuru. To ka Baal e nyasaye madier, luweuru. Uwinjo, timuru kama: Jonabi 450 mag Baal oik ne nyasachgi misango, kendo gilame mondo owinjgi. An be abiro iko misango ne Jehova, kendo abiro kwaye mondo owinja. Nyasaye ma biro kelo mach ma wang’ misango, e Nyasaye madier.’ Ji ne oyie gi wachno.
Jonabi mag Baal ne oloso misango. Ne gilamo nyasachgi odiechieng’ mangima ka giwacho niya: ‘Yaye Baal, winjwa!’ Ka ne Baal ok odwoko lamo margi, Elija ne ojarogi ka wac

.’ Elija nowacho niya: ‘Kik uwe jonabi mag Baal otony kata achiel!’ Chieng’no, ne oneg jonabi 450 mag Baal.
Ka ne bor polo moro matin onenore, Elija ne onyiso Ahab niya: ‘Koth maduong’ biro. Idh gachi iring matek idog dala.’ Polo nodudo, yamo nochako kutho, kendo koth maduong’ ne ochako chue. Gikone, oro ne orumo. Ahab noringo matek gi gache kar nyalone. Jehova nokonyo Elija mi noringo matek mokalo nyaka gach Ahab! Be gik ma ne otimorego ne nyiso ni chandruoge mag Elija koro norumo. Paulo gi Sila nopako Jehova gi wer ka gin e jela. (Tic 16:25) Onge kiawa ni wende ma ne giwero notegogi mondo ginan. To nade wan e kindegi? Wende mitiyogo e chokruok kod wende mamoko ma riwruok mar oganda Jehova oloso, jiwowa kendo konyowa mondo wadhi nyime nano e tembe. E wi mano, wendego pako Jehova. (Za 28:7) Osebed ka ijiwowa mondo wamak weche mag wendego e wiwa. Be isetemo makogi? Wanyalo tiegore mondo wang’e wendego kod weche manie wendego e lamo mar joot.

Idak gi jatich e yo machalo nade?
1: dag gi jatich kaka didag gi nyathini kata nyaminu. Miye luor kaka dimi watni modak eodi. Tere kata e corse mondo obed busy ma chieng’ Moro noparigo.
2: ket jatich thuolo eodi(trust) kimiye pesa mar nyiew chiemo to wekchich kode. We okan pesa moro manyalo nyiewgo pampas mobaogo migingo kapok chudo mari ochopo.
3: mi jatich chiemo morome nikech kokimiye chiemo marome to obochamo chiemb nyathi kaeto nyathi dak kech.
4: ket jatich ochiem kodi e mesa kama ichieme gi nyithindi. Kineno kotoko chiemo mathin to kaw kijiko imedne chiemo e diseno.
5: wek keto ni jatich emaluoko lep chuori, owek goyone chuori long pass, owek luoko anda chuori, chuori biro loke nyieki anytime.
6: chiemo ma chuori chamo ted kendi, kiweyoni jatich ematedone chuori chiemo to bed king’eyoni samionge to obopidho chuori chiemo e dhoge kopire e bamne.
7: wek tamo jatich ni kik chiem e sande mag welo. Pareni kionge to obochieme nikech en emolwokogi.
8: ka jatich tuo to tere osiptal, kendo miye off sama otuo. Miye off odiochieng’ achiel e Juma mondo odhie sabato kata service.
9: wek diemo jatich kotimo makosa, ng’emalong’oni samionge to obiro diemoni nyathi e yo manidiemego. Kaeto ibochako wachoni nyathi Kore ramo to kara jatich ema puodoga koreno.
10: samidhiwuoth to kik iwe jatich gi chuori eot, miye off nyaka chieng’ iduog kiawuoth. Kigalori to obiro mako ich kaeto in emiriembi.

jo ohala echiro ma gikomba kwano lal mag mwandu buora kokaloe masira mar mach.
Written by Phenny Waga on November 7, 2018
Mwandu manengogi pok oyangi owang molokore mirni okinyi makawuono ekar loko ohala ma Gikomba mayudore eboma ama Nairobi okinyi makawuono.
Onge ngato anagata maoyangi ni owito ngimane kata oyudo hinyruok emasira mar majno mane omuoch okinyi makawuononi.Duol mar msalaba makwar kokaloe yor mbui oyangoni joneg mach ma kaunti ma Nairobi okedo matek ahinya kod nego majno.
Nyakagiesani,pod okoyangore gimadine kel majno ka eseche ma jo ohala echirono tokoro kwano lal buora mag mwandugigo.Katakamano,itimo manyalore mar yango gima dine ne kel majno.
Kar ohala ma Gikombano en mano mosebedo kayudo  lal kokaloe masira mar mach chiegni higa ka higa.

Josayans wacho ni guok nyalo ng’eyo ni guok wadgi en jahigni adi, en ma dhako koso dichwo, okwiny koso omuol, to mago duto ofwenyo mana gi ume. Guok inyalo tiegi mi ong’e fwenyo mbom kod yedhe ma sirkal ogoyo marfuk. Dhano nyaka ne gimoro gi wang’e e ka ong’e ni gino ni kanye. Guok to ume kende orome ng’eyo gik ma dhi nyime bute. Inyalo wach ni gisomo gi umgi.
Par ane: Um guok oloyo um dhano nyadi alufe modhuro kodok korka ng’uecho. Ka luwore gi U.S. National Institute of Standards and Technolog
... (89 chars skipped) ... 
n achiel. Mano chalre gi fwenyo ni oket sukari ma dirom lew ojiko e i pi migoyoe abal e tuke mag Olimpik.”
Ang’o momiyo um guok nigi nyalo makende kamano?
Um guok ng’ich, omiyo, yotne kwanyo suya mag gik moko.
Sama um guok ogamo muya, en gi nyalo mar pogo muyano diriyo, ka moko dhi e obo mondo oyue, to moko dhi kama nitie gik mong’uechogo ma kwanyo suya.
Kama nitie gik ma ng’uecho e i um guok lachne ohingo mar dhano nyadi 26.
Kwan mag gik ma kwanyo suya e i um guok oloyo mag dhano nyadi 50.
Mago
... (89 chars skipped) ...
uwore gi jotim nonro moko, dhano nyalo winjo suya mar kado, to guok to nyalo ng’ueyo nyaka gik molunggo kadono.
Joma timo nonro e Pine Street Foundation minonoe weche kansa wacho ni “e piny ngima, obwongo guok kod ume e masin maberie mogik ma inyalo ti godo e fwenyo suya mar gimoro.” Josayans temo loso masin moro ma tiyo ka um guok mondo gifwenyogo mbom, gik ma sirkal ogoyo marfuk, kod tuoche kaka kansa.
Ineno nade? Be nyalo ma um guok nigo mar ng’uecho nosieko kende, koso nitie ng’ama nochueye?

Gedo man ma kilwongo ni Arch of Titus tye ki cal aryo madongo i iye ma nyuto gin mo ma pire tek mutimme con. Ento gin ma dano mapol pe gingeyo aye ni, gedo man kubbe ki lok me Baibul—Arch of Titus tye calo caden ni lok pa lunebi me Baibul cobbe kakare.

MAYIENGA FM: Chopo mar lek mag dongruok e piny Kenya otudore malach kod yore makare mag pur.
County ma Siaya oseketo okenge mararieya mag neon ni chenro mag pur osir kendo okelo yuto ne jopur.
Chenro mag pur sani ka oting’o county ma Siaya nyaka ta aka itiyo kod yor lony manyasani.
Mise malong’o matayo chenro mag pure ma biro jiwo yuto mag jopur.
County ma Siaya bende ka omakore kod joket mwandu mamoko osetiyo machiegni e bero weche mag pur.
Chike ma omakore kod lope bende osebedo obadho maduong’ e jiwo dongruok mar pur.
Dr. Elizabeth Odhiambo ne owacho magi e #DuolMarMayienga kod #CaptainChris.
Quite informative on efforts in Natural Resources Management;
Climate Smart Agricultural practices;
Post Harvest Losses Reduction
Climate Change effects in Siaya County
-Such legislations and good plans need to be publicised and popularized..

GIMOMIYO MANO DWARORE: Ka “rieko manie chuny dhano chal gi pi mokuny matut,” kare penjo chalo gi ndo ma wa twomogo pigno. (Nge 20:5) Penjo miyo jowinjo thuolo mar chiwo pachgi. Ka japuonj otiyo gi penjo moyier maber, dwoko ma japuonjre biro chiwo nyalo konyo e ng’eyo gima nie pache. Yesu notiyo gi penjo e yo molony. Ere kaka wanyalo luwo ranyisine?
KAKA WANYALO TIMO MANO:
Penj penjo ma konyi fwenyo gima nie chuny jawinjo. Yesu notiyo gi penjo mopogore opogore mondo okonye ng’eyo gik ma ne nie chuny jopuonjrene. (Mat 16:13-16; be 238 ¶3-5) Gin penjo kaka mage ma nyalo konyi ng’eyo gima nie chuny ng’ato?
Penj penjo ma konyo jawinjo yudo dwoko. Mondo orie paro mobam ma Petro ne nigo, Yesu nopenje penjo ma nokonye yudo dwoko makare. (Mat 17:24-26) Gin penjo kaka mage ma nyalo konyo jawinjo obed gi paro makare?
Pwo jawinjoni. Bang’ ka jandiko moro “nodwoko e yo mariek,” Yesu nopwoye. (Mar 12:34) Ere kaka inyalo pwoyo ng’at mochiwo dwoko e wi penjo moro?
NEURU VIDIO MA WIYE WACHO NI TI TICH MA YESU NOTIYO—PUONJI, KARE MOKWONGO, KAE TO UDWOK PENJO MALUWOGI:
Ang’o momiyo ma ok en ranyisi maber mar puonjo, kata obedo ni oti gi weche madier?
Ang’o momiyo ok onego waler alera weche kae to waweyo gi kanyo?
NEURU KARE MAR ARIYO MAR VIDIONO, KAE TO UDWOK PENJO MALUWOGI:
Ere kaka owadwano notiyo gi penjo e yo maber?
Gin ranyisi mage mag puonjo mamoko moketonwa?

“Wuwor en ngat ma oketo polo ki lobo.”
Kit ma wapwonyo i brocuwa man, Baibul tye ki pwony mapol ma twero konyo in ki jo me odi. Jehovah mito ni wubed ki yomcwiny. En ocikke ni ka wuketo worone obedo mukwongo, “ci jami ducu gibimedo botwu.” (Matayo 6:33) En mito ni wubed lureme. Ti ki kare ducu me onen me dongo watti ki Lubanga. Man aye mot ma pud dong dit loyo ma ngati mo twero nongone.

Prme Minister ma Australia Scott Morrison
Gi Odalo Fred
Prime Minister ma Australia Scott Morrison ogolo andiko makende mar kwa ng’wono ne jogo duto mosebed kirocho ratichgi eyor bedo e achiel, kowacho ni piny mar Australia ema osebedo kakoso keto mise makare mar chungo wach makamaa.
Ote onogo nochiw e lwasi mar kuyo ahinya kabende ogolo twak mare eod bura makono, twak manegeto kwayo ng’wono ne ji 15,000 duto mosebed kirocho ratichgi eyor bedo e achiel.
Marisson omedoni gin kaka piny owacho wigi
... (123 chars skipped) ... 
 achiel gi nyithindo. Bende oyango historia marach mar pinyonogo kowacho ni oseyangore ni gisebedo kagiumo masira makamaa mosebedo kadhinyime e sikunde bwora, kanise mathoth, klepe mag tuko kata sports clubs kaachiel kod kwonde konyo nyithindo makiye kata orphanages.
Ng’wono makamaa biromana tok kamison moro manyinge Royal Commission chiwo lipot mayango kaka ratich nyithindo osebed kirocho kwonde mopogore opogore yoo Australia kono.
Prime Minister Morrison okwa ng’ono ne nyithindo, jonyuol, jogo
... (123 chars skipped) ...
, jood bura duto ochung malo kendo ling’ thii kwom thwolo matin eparo jogo mosewito ngimagi eyorno mar bedo e achiel mochuno kata bembo ekind mamoko.
Migao mopogore opogore yoo Australia kono bende osewuok oko mar kwa ng’wono kalure gi wechego mag rocho ratich nyithindo. Kalure gi lipot manogol gi Royal Commission yangoni ekind higa mar 1950 nyaka 2010, atamalo 7 mar jodolo mag Catholics yoo Australia iseyo mokalo kwom rocho ratich nyithindo kendo umo wechego mar neno ni okokawnegi kum moramora.

Obila e Sub-county ma Awendo dhi nyime kod timo nonro mar yango wede miyo moro mane oyudi ka thoo kendo ringrene osekethore e dhoo aora ma Nyabwanga e gwenge mag kanyamgony e Awendo odhiambo ma nyoro.
Kane oyango wachnoero commamnder mar obila ma Awendo mikai Mary Wakuu ne okoni ne oyudi lipot mar miyono ma hike nie diere ni ne oyudi e dhoo aora nyabwanga ka osethoo kendo ringrene osekethore.
Mikai wakuu ne okoni obila ma Awendo ne oringo ma piyo ma ochopo kanyo kendo kawo ringruogo ma otero e kar kano ringre jogo ma othoo ma Migori.
Ne okwayo ngato angata ma nyalo bet ni nyalo ongeyo miyono kata ma nyalo bet ni ne olalo watne moro ma miyo mondo onyal chwalo lipot ka obila ma Awendo.

Jami ducu ma Luparicayo onongo gitimo obedo pi nongo pak ki bot dano. Ka gutimo gin mo me kica, nongo gutimo wek jo mukene gunengi. Onongo gilego i dye lwak wek dano weng gunengi. Luparicayo onongo gimako lega maboco ki wigi ci gicito ka wacone i kacokke nyo i dye gudo ka ma dano ducu twero winyone. Pi man, dano gubedo ki ur i kare ma Yecu owaco botgi ni: ‘Pe wuleg calo Luparicayo. Gin gitamo ni Lubanga bibedo ki ur pi lwagi lok ma giduro-ni, ento kulu. Lega tye i kin dano moni ki Jehovah. Pe wubed mere ka nwoyo en lok acel moni-ni. Jehovah mito ni itit bote kit ma iwinyo kwede ki i cwinyi.
‘Dong wuleg kit man ni: “Wonwa ma tye i polo, giwor nyingi maleng. Ker meri obin; giti gin ma imito i lobo kit ma gitiyo i polo.”’ Yecu bene otito botgi ni myero guleg pi camgi me nino meno, wek kitimigi kica pi balgi, ki dong jami mukene ma gudo kwogi.
Yecu owaco ni: ‘Pe wujuk lega. Wumedde ki penyo Wonwu, Jehovah, pi jami mabeco ma wumito. Lunyodo ducu gimito miyo jami mabeco bot lutinogi. Ka latinni olegi ni imiye kwon, ci ibimiye gweng? Ka olegi ni imiye rec, ci ibimiye twol?’
Ka dong Yecu otito ni: ‘Ka wungeyo miyo mot mabeco bot lutinowu, ci Wonwu Jehovah pe bikatowu kun miyo botwu cwiny maleng? Gin ma myero wutim aye me medde ki penye.’ Tika ilubo tam ma Yecu omiyo-ni? Jami macalo mene ma in ilego pire?

Nyadendi Lupita Amondi Nyong'o (onyuole 1 dwe mar adek 1983) en jatugo ma ja Kenya gi Mexico. Ne onyuole Mexico City kuma wuongi, jasiasa ma kenya ngire Peter Anyang' Nyong'o ne puonjoe to ne odak Kenya chakre ka en ja higa achiel.
Ngima ne Kothin[edit | edit source]
Lupita Amondi Nyong'o ne onyuol tarik 1 dwe mar adek 1983 e Mexico City ne jonyuol majokenya, Dorothy Ogada Buyu gi Peter Anyang' Nyong'o, mane japuonj e mbalarieny. Familia gi ne oya Kenya higa mar 1980 nikech siasa marach mane omiyo owadgi Peter Anyang' Nyong'o, Charles Nyong'o ne olal bang ka ne owite kowuok e feri e higa 1980.

KOPIM yiende madongo mag mierezi mag Lebanon gi yiende zeituni mogodore, yiende zeituni ok nyal lombo wang’ kaka mierezi. Kata kamano, yiende zeituni nigi nyalo mar nano kata ang’o ma timre. Wachore ni moko osedak kuom higni 1,000. Nikech tiende zeituni donjo matut ahinya e lowo, ok otwo kata kapo ni otong’e. Obiro loth kendo tek mana ni tiendene pod nie lowo.
Ayub jatich Nyasaye machon ne ni gadier ni kata kapo ni otho, chieng’ nobed mangima kendo. (Ayub14:13-15) Notiyo gi ranyisi mar yien ma samoro nyalo bedo ni ne en yiend zeituni mondo onyisgo ni en gadier ni Nyasaye nyalo chiere. Nowacho kama: “Ka osetong’ yath, to nitie geno ni onyalo loth kendo.” Sama koth ochue bang’ bedo gi oro kuom kinde malach, yiend zeituni ma nosetong’ ma otwo nyalo chier kendo ma chak “loth mana ka yien mochako dongo.”—Ayub 14:7-9, The Bible in Luo, 1976.
Mana kaka japur gombo neno ka zeituni mosetong’ chako loth kendo, e kaka Jehova Nyasaye bende gombo ahinya chiero jotichne mosetho kaachiel gi jomamoko mathoth. (Math. 22:31, 32; Joh. 5:28, 29; Tich 24:15) Mano kaka wabiro bedo mamor rwako joma ochier ma wanegi ka gidak kendo e ngima maber!

MIYO MA JAHIGNI 50 GIBATHE ONDHI GI OBILA KITUGE GI NEK MAR WUON PARGI
Written by Dickens Ochieng on June 23, 2021
MIYO MORO MA JAHIGNI 50 GIBATHE KORONI OBILA ONDHIYO EGWENGE MAG PALA MASOGO EI KOTHIDHA EKAR CHUNG’ OD BURA MA HOMABAY TOWN KALUWORE KODA NEGO WUON PARGI NE WECHE MITENO KODA YWARUOK MAG UDI.
MIYONO MOYANG GINYING MAR JANE ONDIEK NE ONDHI KOD OBILA MAWUOK E TESEND OBILA MA HOMABAY BANG’ NEK MAR WUON PARGI MOYANG NYINGE KAKA ISAACK ONDIEK MA JAHIGNI 60 MABENDE NEJONEGI KITIYO KODA LEE CHIENG’ WUOK TICH OTIENO.
KANEOYANGO WACHNOERO RUOTH MA ALUORANO MIGOSI JOHN OMAMO WACHONI JAGONO NE OYUD KANIKOD HINYRUOK EWIYE KODA KA NG’UTE MABENDE NEOTONG’ KODA LEE,NE WECHEGO MAITUDO KODA YWARUOK MAG UDI.
JATEND NANGANO NEJOWACHONI LER MAGITEMO YUDO KOWUOK KUOM JOGWENG’ ENI MIYO ONOGO NEJOPANGO NEK MAR WUON PARGI NOERO.
NE OMEDO YANGONI MIYONOERO EKINDE MOKALO NOSETEMO MAR KETO KWIRI E CHIEMO NE JAODENO KOTIYO KODA RAWERA MORO EGWENG MAKONO.
KA MIYO ONOGO GIEKINDENI ODIN NE E TESED OBILA MA HOMABAY KAPOD IDHIYO NYIME GITIMO NONRO,KA RINGRE WUON PARGI TO OSECHWAL EKAR KANO RINGRE JOMOTHO MA HOMABAY KAORITO TIMO BERO.

Kara juruot ubed ku mutoro, ukwayu ng’atuman unyuth mer ni wadi. Juefeso 5:33
Cik pa Mungu ubeyero nia gamiri ucikere ni bedo i kind ng’atu ma nico acel ku ng’atu ma dhaku de acel.
Nico ma won mer kimbo kum dhaku pare akimba man eng’eye cu.
Dhaku ucikere ni dikocinge ku won ot pare.
Ukwayu awiya ubed wor ni junyodo migi.
Bed mol man ng’atu m’atira. Kud ibed jarop man won umbili. Jukolosai 3:5, 8-10.
Biblia ubeyero nia nico ucikere ni maru dhaku pare calu kume gire, man dhaku ne de ucikere ni bedo ku woro ma thuth ni nico pare.
Ribiri ku ng’atu matie jadhogi mi nyom ungo utie dubo. Bedo kuda dhura de utie dubo.
Biblia ma lembe pa Yehova ubeponjo gin m’ukwayu juruot utim kara gibed ku mutoro.
PONJ LEMBE LEE AKECA
LEMBANYONG’A M’UAI I BANG’ MUNGU!
Yehova, Mungu wa jamutoro, ubemito juruot ubed ku mutoro. Nwang’ juk ma ber ma Biblia mio pi konyo coo, mon, junyodo, man awiya.

Saulo ne obedo ruodh Israel mokwongo. Kata kamano, Jehova ne ogole, ma kare ne oketie Daudi kaka ruoth. Wapuonjore gik mang’eny kuom Daudi. Kane podi en rawera, ne okedo gi ng’at mogangore marabet miluongo ni Goliath. Bang’e ne oringo nikech nyiego mar Ruoth Saulo. Kendo Abigail dhako man gi chia, ne ogeng’e kik otim tim mofuwo.
Maluwo mano, wapuonjore gik mang’eny kuom Solomon wuod Daudi, ma ne okawo kar Daudi kaka ruodh Israel. Kuom ruodhi adek mokwongo mag Israel, moro ka moro ne otelo kuom higini 40. Bang’ tho Solomon, Israel ne opogore nyadiriyo, pinyruoth ma masawa kod pinyruoth ma milambo.
Pinyruoth ma masawa moting’o dhoudi 10, ne obetie kuom higini 257 kane podi ok okethe gi Jo-Asuria. Higini 133 bang’e, pinyruoth ma milambo moting’o dhoudi ariyo, bende ne okethi. E kindeni, Jo-Israel ne oter kaka wasumbini Babulon. Kuom mano, Kare mar ANG’WEN wuoyo kuom higini 510 mag gik mang’eny matimore.
